trans-unit.target: Identical

trans-unit.source: Identical to fgets(), except that fgetss() attempts to strip any NUL bytes, HTML and PHP tags from the text it reads.
trans-unit.target: 与fgets（）相同，除了fgetss（）尝试从读取的文本中剥离所有NUL字节，HTML和PHP标记。

trans-unit.source: Identical to file_get_contents(), except that stream_get_contents() operates on an already open stream resource and returns the remaining contents in a string, up to maxlength bytes and starting at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: 与file_get_contents（）相同，不同之处在于stream_get_contents（）对已经打​​开的流资源进行操作，并以字符串形式返回剩余内容（最大长度为 maxlength ),并从指定的 offset 开始。

trans-unit.source: Identical to getimagesize() except that getimagesizefromstring() accepts a string instead of a file name as the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与getimagesize（）相同，除了getimagesizefromstring（）接受字符串而不是文件名作为第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: Identical to gzgets(), except that gzgetss() attempts to strip any HTML and PHP tags from the text it reads.
trans-unit.target: 与gzgets（）相同，除了gzgetss（）尝试从其读取的文本中剥离所有HTML和PHP标记。

trans-unit.source: Identical to imap_getmailboxes(), except that it only returns mailboxes that the user is subscribed to.
trans-unit.target: 与imap_getmailboxes（）相同，除了它只返回用户已预订的邮箱。

trans-unit.source: Identical to mktime() except the passed parameters represents a GMT date. gmmktime() internally uses mktime() so only times valid in derived local time can be used.
trans-unit.target: 与mktime（）相同，除了传递的参数表示GMT日期。gmmktime（）内部使用mktime（），因此只能使用在派生本地时间中有效的时间。

trans-unit.source: Identical to PDO::errorCode(), except that PDOStatement::errorCode() only retrieves error codes for operations performed with PDOStatement objects.
trans-unit.target: 与PDO :: errorCode（）相同，除了PDOStatement :: errorCode（）仅检索针对PDOStatement对象执行的操作的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Identical to SplFileObject::fgets(), except that SplFileObject::fgetss() attempts to strip any HTML and PHP tags from the text it reads.
trans-unit.target: 与SplFileObject :: fgets（）相同，除了SplFileObject :: fgetss（）尝试从读取的文本中剥离所有HTML和PHP标记。

trans-unit.source: Identical to the date() function except that the time returned is Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).
trans-unit.target: 除返回的时间是格林威治标准时间（GMT）以外，与date（）函数相同。

trans-unit.source: Identification string
trans-unit.target: 识别字符串

trans-unit.source: Identifier string for the executed code. Used for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 执行代码的标识符串。用于调试。

trans-unit.source: Identifies an image and returns the attributes. Attributes include the image width, height, size, and others.
trans-unit.target: 识别一个图像并返回属性。属性包括图像的宽度、高度、大小等。

trans-unit.source: Identify which channel to extract: RedChannel, GreenChannel, BlueChannel, OpacityChannel, CyanChannel, MagentaChannel, YellowChannel, BlackChannel.
trans-unit.target: 确定要提取的通道:RedChannel、GreenChannel、BlueChannel、OpacityChannel、CyanChannel、MagentaChannel、YellowChannel、BlackChannel。

trans-unit.source: Identify which channel to normalize
trans-unit.target: 确定要归一化的通道

trans-unit.target: 缓存条目的身份

trans-unit.target: 闲置优先级

trans-unit.source: If "URL include wrappers" are enabled in PHP, you can specify the file to be included using a URL (via HTTP or other supported wrapper - see Supported Protocols and Wrappers for a list of protocols) instead of a local pathname. If the target server interprets the target file as PHP code, variables may be passed to the included file using a URL request string as used with HTTP GET. This is not strictly speaking the same thing as including the file and having it inherit the parent file's variable scope; the script is actually being run on the remote server and the result is then being included into the local script.
trans-unit.target: 如果在PHP中启用了“ URL include wrappers ”，则可以使用URL（通过HTTP或其他受支持的包装器-参见“ 支持的协议和包装器”以获取协议列表）而不是本地路径名来指定要包含的文件。如果目标服务器将目标文件解释为PHP代码，则可以使用与HTTP GET一起使用的URL请求字符串将变量传递到包含的文件。从严格意义上讲，这与包括文件并让其继承父文件的变量作用域不同；该脚本实际上是在远程服务器上运行的，然后将结果包含在本地脚本中。

trans-unit.source: If 'bestfit' is enabled, and distortion allows it, the destination image is adjusted to ensure the whole source 'image' will just fit within the final destination image, which will be sized and offset accordingly. Also in many cases the virtual offset of the source image will be taken into account in the mapping.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 "bestfit",并且变形允许,则会调整目标图像,以确保整个源 "图像 "刚好适合最终的目标图像,而最终的目标图像也会相应地调整大小和偏移。此外,在许多情况下,源图像的虚拟偏移也会被考虑到映射中。

trans-unit.source: If -1 is used, the default compression of the zlib library is used which is 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用-1,则使用zlib库的默认压缩,即6。

trans-unit.source: If odbc_fetch_into() is used, passthru means that an empty string is returned for these columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用odbc_fetch_into（），则passthru表示将为这些列返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If session_start() was not called before this function is called, an implicit call to session_start() with no parameters will be made. $_SESSION does not mimic this behavior and requires session_start() before use.
trans-unit.target: 如果在session_start（）被调用这个函数之前没有调用，隐式调用在session_start（）不带参数将会作出修改。 $_SESSION 不会模仿此行为，并且在使用前需要session_start（）。

trans-unit.source: If mbstring is enabled, exif will attempt to process the unicode and pick a charset as specified by exif.decode_unicode_motorola and exif.decode_unicode_intel. The exif extension will not attempt to figure out the encoding on its own, and it is up to the user to properly specify the encoding for which to use for decoding by setting one of these two ini directives prior to calling exif_read_data().
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了mbstring，则exif将尝试处理unicode并选择exif.decode_unicode_motorola和exif.decode_unicode_intel指定的字符集。exif扩展名不会自行尝试进行编码，并且由用户自行决定，通过在调用exif_read_data（）之前设置这两个ini指令之一来正确指定用于解码的编码。

trans-unit.source: If magic_quotes_sybase is on, no backslashes are stripped off but two apostrophes are replaced by one instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果magic_quotes_sybase启用，则不会去除反斜杠，而是将两个撇号替换为一个。

trans-unit.source: If PCRE_DOLLAR_ENDONLY is set and PCRE_MULTILINE is not set, the $ meta-character matches only at the very end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了PCRE_DOLLAR_ENDONLY而未设置PCRE_MULTILINE，则$元字符仅在字符串的最后匹配。

trans-unit.source: If PCRE_EXTRA is set, a backslash followed by a letter with no special meaning is faulted.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了PCRE_EXTRA，则反斜杠后接没有特殊含义的字母是错误的。

trans-unit.source: If PCRE_UNGREEDY is set, the greediness of the repetition quantifiers is inverted, that is, by default they are not greedy, but if followed by a question mark they are.
trans-unit.target: 如果PCRE_UNGREEDY设置，重复量词的贪婪被反转，即，默认时不贪，但如果跟着一个问号他们。

trans-unit.source: If $timezone is omitted, the current timezone will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 $timezone ，将使用当前时区。

trans-unit.source: If OnOff is TRUE, auto-commit is enabled, if it is FALSE auto-commit is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 OnOff 为 TRUE ，则启用自动提交，如果为 FALSE ,则禁用自动提交。

trans-unit.source: If OnOff is set, this function returns TRUE on success and FALSE on failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 OnOff ，则此函数在成功时返回 TRUE ，在失败时返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If address is provided it will be populated with the address of the remote socket.
trans-unit.target: 如果 address 设置将与远程套接字的地址填充。

trans-unit.source: If array_result is FALSE, matches are returned as a hash with document IDs as keys, and other information (weight, attributes) as values. If array_result is TRUE, matches are returned as a plain array with complete per-match information including document IDs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 array_result 为 FALSE ，则将匹配项作为哈希值返回，以文档ID作为键，而其他信息（权重，属性）作为值。如果 array_result 为 TRUE ，则将匹配项作为具有完整按匹配项信息（包括文档ID）的纯数组返回。

trans-unit.source: If base is 0, the base used is determined by the format of var:
trans-unit.target: 如果 base 为0，则使用的基数由 var 的格式确定：

trans-unit.source: If bind_password is not specified or is empty, an anonymous bind is attempted. The bind_rdn can also be left empty for an anonymous bind. This is defined in https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2251#section-4.2.2
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 bind_password 或为空，则尝试进行匿名绑定。对于匿名绑定， bind_rdn 也可以保留为空。这在https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2251#section-4.2.2中定义

trans-unit.source: If cache_limiter is specified, the name of the current cache limiter is changed to the new value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 cache_limiter ，则当前缓存限制器的名称将更改为新值。

trans-unit.source: If cache_type is "filehits", information about which files have been served from the bytecode cache for the current request will be returned. This feature must be enabled at compile time using --enable-filehits .
trans-unit.target: 如果 cache_type 为“ filehits ”，则将返回有关当前请求的字节码缓存中已提供哪些文件的信息。必须在编译时使用--enable-filehits启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: If cache_type is "user", information about the user cache will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cache_type 为“ user ”，则将返回有关用户缓存的信息。

trans-unit.source: If cache_type is "user", the user cache will be cleared; otherwise, the system cache (cached files) will be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cache_type 为“ user ”，则将清除用户缓存；否则，将清除系统缓存（缓存的文件）。

trans-unit.source: If callback needs to be working with the actual values of the array, specify the first parameter of callback as a reference. Then, any changes made to those elements will be made in the original array itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果 callback 需要使用数组的实际值，则将 callback 的第一个参数指定为reference。然后，对这些元素所做的任何更改都将在原始数组本身中进行。

trans-unit.source: If callbackfunc is not NULL returns TRUE on success.
trans-unit.target: 如果 callbackfunc 不为 NULL ,则在成功时返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: If callbackfunc is set to NULL, returns the extracted section as a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 callbackfunc 设置为 NULL ，则将提取的部分作为字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: If case_insensitivity is TRUE, comparison is case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果 case_insensitivity 为 TRUE ，则比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If charset parameter is omitted, str is assumed to be encoded in iconv.internal_encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 charset 参数，则假定 str 以iconv.internal_encoding编码。

trans-unit.source: If charset parameter is omitted, string are assumed to be encoded in iconv.internal_encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 charset 参数，则假定 string 已在iconv.internal_encoding中进行编码。

trans-unit.source: If connection_id is specified, the last state of that connection is returned, else the last state of any connection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 connection_id 指定，该连接的最后状态返回，否则会返回任何连接的最后状态。

trans-unit.source: If data is a stream resource, the remaining buffer of that stream will be copied to the specified file. This is similar with using stream_copy_to_stream().
trans-unit.target: 如果 data 是流资源，则该流的剩余缓冲区将被复制到指定文件。这与使用stream_copy_to_stream（）相似。

trans-unit.source: If delimiter is an empty string (""), explode() will return FALSE. If delimiter contains a value that is not contained in string and a negative limit is used, then an empty array will be returned, otherwise an array containing string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 delimiter 为空字符串（“”），则explode（）将返回 FALSE 。如果 delimiter 包含的值不包含在 string 并且使用负数 limit ，则将返回一个空数组，否则将返回一个包含 string 的数组。

trans-unit.source: If desiredmsgtype is 0, the message from the front of the queue is returned. If desiredmsgtype is greater than 0, then the first message of that type is returned. If desiredmsgtype is less than 0, the first message on the queue with the lowest type less than or equal to the absolute value of desiredmsgtype will be read. If no messages match the criteria, your script will wait until a suitable message arrives on the queue. You can prevent the script from blocking by specifying MSG_IPC_NOWAIT in the flags parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果 desiredmsgtype 为0，则返回队列前面的消息。如果 desiredmsgtype 大于0，则返回该类型的第一条消息。如果 desiredmsgtype 小于0，则将读取队列中最低类型小于或等于 desiredmsgtype 的绝对值的第一条消息。如果没有符合条件的消息，您的脚本将等待，直到适当的消息到达队列。您可以通过在 flags 参数中指定 MSG_IPC_NOWAIT 来防止脚本阻塞。

trans-unit.source: If divisor is 0, a DivisionByZeroError exception is thrown. If the dividend is PHP_INT_MIN and the divisor is -1, then an ArithmeticError exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 divisor 为0，则抛出DivisionByZeroError异常。如果 dividend 为 PHP_INT_MIN 并且 divisor 为-1，则抛出ArithmeticError异常。

trans-unit.source: If dns_base is NULL, hostname resolution will block.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dns_base 为 NULL ，则将阻止主机名解析。

trans-unit.source: If enable is not specified: returns TRUE if the VT100 feature is enabled, FALSE otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 enable ：如果启用了VT100功能，则返回 TRUE ，否则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If enable is omitted, the function return TRUE if the stream stream has has VT100 control codes enabled, FALSE otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果 enable 被省略，函数返回 TRUE 如果流 stream 有了VT100控制代码启用， FALSE 反之。

trans-unit.source: If enable is specified, the function will try to enable or disable the VT100 features of the stream stream. If the feature has been successfully enabled (or disabled), the function will return TRUE, or FALSE otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 enable ，则该功能将尝试启用或禁用流 stream 的VT100功能。如果已成功启用（或禁用）该功能，则该函数将返回 TRUE ，否则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If enable is specified: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 enable ：成功则返回 TRUE ，失败则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If enc_type is PHP_QUERY_RFC1738, then encoding is performed per » RFC 1738 and the application/x-www-form-urlencoded media type, which implies that spaces are encoded as plus (+) signs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 enc_type 为 PHP_QUERY_RFC1738 ，则按照»RFC 1738和application / x-www-form-urlencoded媒体类型执行编码，这意味着空格被编码为加号（+）。

trans-unit.source: If enc_type is PHP_QUERY_RFC3986, then encoding is performed according to » RFC 3986, and spaces will be percent encoded (%20).
trans-unit.target: 如果 enc_type 为 PHP_QUERY_RFC3986 ，则根据»RFC 3986执行编码，空格将按百分比编码（％20）。

trans-unit.source: If encoding is omitted, mb_http_output() returns the current HTTP output character encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 encoding ，则mb_http_output（）返回当前HTTP输出字符编码。

trans-unit.source: If encoding is omitted, mb_http_output() returns the current HTTP output character encoding. Otherwise, Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 encoding ，则mb_http_output（）返回当前HTTP输出字符编码。否则，如果成功，则返回 TRUE ； FALSE 失败，则返回FALSE。

trans-unit.source: If encoding is set, mb_http_output() sets the HTTP output character encoding to encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 encoding ，则mb_http_output（）会将 HTTP输出字符编码设置为 encoding 。

trans-unit.source: If encoding is set, then Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure. In this case, the character encoding for multibyte regex is NOT changed. If encoding is omitted, then the current character encoding name is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 encoding ，则成功返回 TRUE 或失败返回 FALSE 。在这种情况下，多字节正则表达式的字符编码不会更改。如果 encoding 被省略，那么当前的字符编码名称返回。

trans-unit.source: If encoding is set, then Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure. In this case, the internal character encoding is NOT changed. If encoding is omitted, then the current character encoding name for a multibyte regex is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 encoding ，则成功返回 TRUE 或失败返回 FALSE 。在这种情况下，内部字符编码不会更改。如果 encoding 被省略，则返回一个多字节正则表达式当前字符编码名称。

trans-unit.source: If encoding_list is omitted, detect_order is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 encoding_list ，则使用detect_order。

trans-unit.source: If encoding_list is omitted, it returns the current character encoding detection order as array.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 encoding_list ，则将当前字符编码检测顺序作为数组返回。

trans-unit.source: If filename does not exist, the file is created. Otherwise, the existing file is overwritten, unless the FILE_APPEND flag is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果 filename 不存在，则创建文件。否则，除非设置了 FILE_APPEND 标志，否则现有文件将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If filename is a valid upload file, but cannot be moved for some reason, no action will occur, and move_uploaded_file() will return FALSE. Additionally, a warning will be issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果 filename 是有效的上载文件，但由于某种原因而无法移动，则不会执行任何操作，并且move_uploaded_file（）将返回 FALSE 。此外，将发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If filename is not a valid upload file, then no action will occur, and move_uploaded_file() will return FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果 filename 不是有效的上传文件，则不会执行任何操作，并且move_uploaded_file（）将返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If filename is of the form "scheme://...", it is assumed to be a URL and PHP will search for a protocol handler (also known as a wrapper) for that scheme. If no wrappers for that protocol are registered, PHP will emit a notice to help you track potential problems in your script and then continue as though filename specifies a regular file.
trans-unit.target: 如果 filename 的格式为“ scheme：// ...”，则假定它是一个URL，PHP将为该方案搜索协议处理程序（也称为包装器）。如果未注册该协议的包装器，PHP将发出通知，以帮助您跟踪脚本中的潜在问题，然后继续执行，就好像 filename 指定了常规文件一样。

trans-unit.source: If fk_table contains a table name, odbc_foreignkeys() returns a result set containing all of the foreign keys in the specified table and the primary keys (in other tables) to which they refer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 fk_table 包含表名，则odbc_foreignkeys（）返回一个结果集，其中包含指定表中的所有外键以及它们所引用的主键（在其他表中）。

trans-unit.source: If flags is not specified, it is assumed to be EXTR_OVERWRITE.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 flags ，则假定为 EXTR_OVERWRITE 。

trans-unit.source: If format contains the character !, then portions of the generated time not provided in format, as well as values to the left-hand side of the !, will be set to corresponding values from the Unix epoch.
trans-unit.target: 如果 format 包含字符！，然后生成的时间的一部分（未以 format 提供）以及！左侧的值。将从Unix时代设置为相应的值。

trans-unit.source: If format does not contain the character ! then portions of the generated time which are not specified in format will be set to the current system time.
trans-unit.target: 如果 format 不包含字符！则未按 format 指定的生成时间部分将设置为当前系统时间。

trans-unit.source: If from and to have different lengths, the extra characters in the longer of the two are ignored. The length of str will be the same as the return value's.
trans-unit.target: 如果 from 和 to 具有不同的长度，在两者的时间越长，多余的字符将被忽略。 str 的长度将与返回值的长度相同。

trans-unit.source: If get_as_float is set to TRUE, then microtime() returns a float, which represents the current time in seconds since the Unix epoch accurate to the nearest microsecond.
trans-unit.target: 如果 get_as_float 设置为 TRUE ，则microtime（）返回一个float，它表示自Unix纪元精确到最近的微秒以来的当前时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: If handle is not a resource this functions returns NULL. Formerly, FALSE has been returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 handle 不是资源，则此函数返回 NULL 。以前， FALSE 已返回。

trans-unit.source: If handle was fopen()ed in append mode, fwrite()s are atomic (unless the size of string exceeds the filesystem's block size, on some platforms, and as long as the file is on a local filesystem). That is, there is no need to flock() a resource before calling fwrite(); all of the data will be written without interruption.
trans-unit.target: 如果 handle 在附加模式下为fopen（） ed，则fwrite（）是原子的（除非在某些平台上，并且只要文件位于本地文件系统上， string 的大小超过文件系统的块大小）。也就是说，在调用fwrite（）之前不需要flock（）资源；所有数据将被不间断地写入。

trans-unit.source: If haystack or needle is not a string, it is converted to a string and applied as the ordinal value of a character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 haystack 或 needle 不是字符串，则将其转换为字符串并用作字符的序数值。

trans-unit.source: If id is specified, it will replace the current session id. session_id() needs to be called before session_start() for that purpose. Depending on the session handler, not all characters are allowed within the session id. For example, the file session handler only allows characters in the range a-z A-Z 0-9 , (comma) and - (minus)!
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 id ，它将替换当前的会话ID。SESSION_ID（）需要之前调用在session_start（）用于这一目的。根据会话处理程序的不同，会话ID内不允许所有字符。例如，文件会话处理程序仅允许az AZ 0-9范围内的字符，（逗号）和-（减号）！

trans-unit.source: If is_prefix is TRUE, ns will be regarded as a prefix. If FALSE, ns will be regarded as a namespace
trans-unit.target: 如果 is_prefix 为 TRUE ，则 ns 将被视为前缀。如果为 FALSE ，则 ns 将被视为名称空间

trans-unit.source: If language is set and language is valid, it returns TRUE. Otherwise, it returns FALSE. When language is omitted, it returns the language name as a string. If no language is set previously, it then returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果 language 设置和 language 是有效的，则返回 TRUE 。否则，它返回 FALSE 。当 language 被省略，则返回语言名称作为一个字符串。如果先前未设置任何语言，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If length is 0, the output length will default to the chosen hash function size.
trans-unit.target: 如果 length 为0，则输出长度将默认为所选哈希函数的大小。

trans-unit.source: If length is given and is 0, FALSE or NULL, an empty string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 length 并为0， FALSE 或 NULL ，则将返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If length is given and is negative, then subject will be examined from the starting position up to length characters from the end of subject.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 length 且为负数，则将从开始位置开始检查 subject 直到从 subject 末尾开始的 length 字符为止。

trans-unit.source: If length is given and is negative, then that many characters will be omitted from the end of string (after the start position has been calculated when a start is negative). If start denotes the position of this truncation or beyond, FALSE will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 length ，并给出为否定，则许多字符将从的末端被省略 string （以后开始位置已经在算出 start 是负的）。如果 start 指示此截断位置或更高，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If length is given and is non-negative, then subject will be examined for length characters after the starting position.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的 length 为非负数，则将检查 subject 在开始位置之后的 length 字符。

trans-unit.source: If length is given and is positive, the return value will contain at most length characters of the portion that begins at offset (depending on the length of string).
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 length 且为正，则返回值最多包含以 offset 开头的部分的 length 字符（取决于 string 的长度）。

trans-unit.source: If length is given and is positive, the string returned will contain at most length characters beginning from start (depending on the length of string).
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 length 并为正，则返回的字符串最多将从 start 包含 length 字符（取决于 string 的长度）。

trans-unit.source: If length is given and is positive, then the sequence will have up to that many elements in it. If the array is shorter than the length, then only the available array elements will be present. If length is given and is negative then the sequence will stop that many elements from the end of the array. If it is omitted, then the sequence will have everything from offset up until the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 length 并且为正，则序列中最多包含这么多元素。如果数组比 length 短，那么将仅显示可用的数组元素。如果给定 length 并为负数，则序列将从数组末尾停止那么多元素。如果省略它，则该序列将包含从 offset 到 array 末尾的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: If length is given and positive and the argument string is shorter than the specified length, all the rest of the string according to start parameter is returned. Previously, FALSE was returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 length 且为正数，并且参数字符串短于指定的长度，则根据 start 参数返回字符串的所有其余部分。以前，返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If length is omitted, removes everything from offset to the end of the array. If length is specified and is positive, then that many elements will be removed. If length is specified and is negative then the end of the removed portion will be that many elements from the end of the array. If length is specified and is zero, no elements will be removed. Tip: to remove everything from offset to the end of the array when replacement is also specified, use count($input) for length.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 length ，则将所有内容从 offset 移到数组的结尾。如果指定了 length 且为正，则将删除许多元素。如果指定了 length 且为负数，则删除部分的末尾将是数组末尾的元素数。如果 length 指定为零，则不会删除任何元素。提示：若还指定了 replacement 则要从 offset 到数组末尾的所有内容都删除，请使用count（$ input）作为 length 。

trans-unit.source: If length is omitted, the substring starting from start until the end of the string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 length ，则将返回从 start 到字符串结尾的子字符串。

trans-unit.source: If limit is set and positive, the returned array will contain a maximum of limit elements with the last element containing the rest of string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 limit 设置为正，则返回的数组将包含最多 limit 元素，最后一个元素包含 string 的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: If limit is set, the returned array will contain a maximum of limit elements with the last element containing the whole rest of string.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 limit ，则返回的数组将最多包含 limit 个元素，而最后一个元素将包含整个 string 其余部分。

trans-unit.source: If limited is TRUE, the return value will exclude the individual list of cache entries. This is useful when trying to optimize calls for statistics gathering.
trans-unit.target: 如果 limited 为 TRUE ，则返回值将排除高速缓存条目的各个列表。在尝试优化统计信息收集的调用时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If local_username is omitted, then the value for username will be used for it.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 local_username ，则将使用 username 的值。

trans-unit.source: If locale is "0", the locale setting is not affected, only the current setting is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 locale 为“ 0”，则不影响语言环境设置，仅返回当前设置。

trans-unit.source: If locale is NULL or the empty string "", the locale names will be set from the values of environment variables with the same names as the above categories, or from "LANG".
trans-unit.target: 如果 locale 为 NULL 或空字符串“”，则将使用与上述类别同名的环境变量的值或使用“ LANG”来设置语言环境名称。

trans-unit.source: If locale is an array or followed by additional parameters then each array element or parameter is tried to be set as new locale until success. This is useful if a locale is known under different names on different systems or for providing a fallback for a possibly not available locale.
trans-unit.target: 如果 locale 是一个数组或后跟其他参数，则尝试将每个数组元素或参数设置为新的语言环境，直到成功。如果在不同系统上以不同的名称知道一个语言环境，或者为可能不可用的语言环境提供后备功能，则这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If matches is provided, then it is filled with the results of search. $matches[0] will contain the text that matched the full pattern, $matches[1] will have the text that matched the first captured parenthesized subpattern, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 matches ，则将其填充为搜索结果。 $matches[0] 将包含与完整模式匹配的文本， $matches[1] 将具有与第一个捕获的带括号的子模式匹配的文本，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If max is less than min, an Error will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 max 小于 min ，将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: If max_memory is negative, only memory will be used. If max_memory is zero, no memory will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 max_memory 为负，则仅使用内存。如果 max_memory 为零，则不会使用任何内存。

trans-unit.source: If mode is FALSE, the given stream will be switched to non-blocking mode, and if TRUE, it will be switched to blocking mode. This affects calls like fgets() and fread() that read from the stream. In non-blocking mode an fgets() call will always return right away while in blocking mode it will wait for data to become available on the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果 mode 为 FALSE ，则给定的流将切换为非阻塞模式，如果为 TRUE ，则将其切换为阻塞模式。这会影响从流读取的fgets（）和fread（）之类的调用。在非阻塞模式下，fgets（）调用将始终立即返回，而在阻塞模式下，它将等待数据在流中变得可用。

trans-unit.source: If module is specified, that module will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果 module 指定的，该模块将被使用。

trans-unit.source: If ndocs is provided, then it is filled with the number of documents found in stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 ndocs ，则将在流中找到的文档数填充其中。

trans-unit.source: If needle contains more than one character, only the first is used. This behavior is different from that of strstr().
trans-unit.target: 如果 needle 包含多个字符，则仅使用第一个字符。此行为不同于strstr（）的行为。

trans-unit.source: If needle is a string, the comparison is done in a case-sensitive manner.
trans-unit.target: 如果 needle 是字符串，则以区分大小写的方式进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If needle is found in haystack more than once, the first matching key is returned. To return the keys for all matching values, use array_keys() with the optional search_value parameter instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 haystack 多次发现 needle ，则返回第一个匹配的键。要返回所有匹配值的键，请使用array_keys（）和可选的 search_value 参数。

trans-unit.source: If needle is not a string, it is converted to an integer and applied as the ordinal value of a character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 needle 不是字符串，则将其转换为整数并用作字符的序数值。

trans-unit.source: If needle is not found, iconv_strpos() will return FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到 needle ，iconv_strpos（）将返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If needle is not found, iconv_strrpos() will return FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到 needle ，iconv_strrpos（）将返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If new_cache_expire is given, the current cache expire is replaced with new_cache_expire.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 new_cache_expire ，则当前的缓存过期将替换为 new_cache_expire 。

trans-unit.source: If object is omitted when inside a class, the name of that class is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在类内部省略 object ，则返回该类的名称。

trans-unit.source: If offset and length are such that nothing is removed, then the elements from the replacement array are inserted in the place specified by the offset. Note that keys in replacement array are not preserved.
trans-unit.target: 如果 offset 和 length 使得什么都没有去除，则将 replacement 数组中的元素插入 offset 指定的位置。请注意，替换数组中的键不会保留。

trans-unit.source: If offset is negative, iconv_substr() cuts out the portion beginning at the position, offset characters away from the end of str.
trans-unit.target: 如果 offset 为负，则iconv_substr（）切除从该位置开始的部分，将字符 offset 到 str 的末端。

trans-unit.source: If offset is non-negative, iconv_substr() cuts the portion out of str beginning at offset'th character, counting from zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果 offset 是非负的，iconv_substr（）切断部分出的 str 在开始 offset “个字符，从零计数。

trans-unit.source: If offset is non-negative, the sequence will start at that offset in the array. If offset is negative, the sequence will start that far from the end of the array. Note that the offset denotes the position in the array, not the key.
trans-unit.target: 如果 offset 为非负数，则序列将从 array 中的该offset开始。如果 offset 为负，则序列将从 array 末尾开始。请注意， offset 表示数组中的位置，而不是键。

trans-unit.source: If offset is positive then the start of removed portion is at that offset from the beginning of the input array. If offset is negative then it starts that far from the end of the input array.
trans-unit.target: 如果 offset 为正，则已删除部分的起始位置为距 input 数组起始位置的偏移量。如果 offset 为负，则它从 input 数组的末尾开始。

trans-unit.source: If opt is given, returns its value. Otherwise, returns an associative array with the following elements (which correspond to opt), or FALSE on failure:
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 opt ，则返回其值。否则，返回包含以下元素（与 opt 相对应）的关联数组，否则返回 FALSE ：

trans-unit.source: If option is
trans-unit.target: 如果 option 是

trans-unit.source: If options is not specified, returns all available elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 options ，则返回所有可用元素。

trans-unit.source: If options is present, returns a string containing the requested element.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 options ，则返回包含所请求元素的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If output_callback returns FALSE original input is sent to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 如果 output_callback 返回 FALSE ，则将原始输入发送到浏览器。

trans-unit.source: If owner is a single percent character (%) and qualifier and name are empty strings, then the result set contains a list of valid owners for the data source. (All columns except the TABLE_OWNER column contain NULLs.)
trans-unit.target: 如果 owner 是单个百分比字符（％），并且 qualifier 和 name 是空字符串，则结果集将包含数据源的有效所有者的列表。（除TABLE_OWNER列以外的所有列均包含NULL。）

trans-unit.source: If param is NULL, it is always treated as SQLITE3_NULL, regardless of the given type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 param 为 NULL ，则无论给定 type 如何，始终将其视为 SQLITE3_NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If path is not a valid directory or the directory can not be opened due to permission restrictions or filesystem errors, opendir() returns FALSE and generates a PHP error of level E_WARNING. You can suppress the error output of opendir() by prepending '@' to the front of the function name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 不是有效目录，或者由于权限限制或文件系统错误而无法打开目录，则opendir（）返回 FALSE 并生成级别为E_WARNING的PHP错误。您可以通过在函数名称的前面加上' @ '来抑制opendir（）的错误输出。

trans-unit.source: If path is relative, search for the resource using the include_path.
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 是相对的，则使用include_path搜索资源。

trans-unit.source: If pattern contains parenthesized substrings, replacement may contain substrings of the form \digit, which will be replaced by the text matching the digit'th parenthesized substring; \0 will produce the entire contents of string. Up to nine substrings may be used. Parentheses may be nested, in which case they are counted by the opening parenthesis.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pattern 包含带括号的子字符串，则 replacement 可能包含\ digit形式的子字符串，该子字符串将由与第digit个带括号的子字符串匹配的文本替换；\ 0将产生字符串的全部内容。最多可以使用九个子字符串。括号可以嵌套，在这种情况下，括号以开括号计算。

trans-unit.source: If pk_table contains a table name, odbc_foreignkeys() returns a result set containing the primary key of the specified table and all of the foreign keys that refer to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pk_table 包含一个表名，则odbc_foreignkeys（）返回一个结果集，其中包含指定表的主键以及引用该表的所有外键。

trans-unit.source: If prefix is specified, new session id is prefixed by prefix. Not all characters are allowed within the session id. Characters in the range a-z A-Z 0-9 , (comma) and - (minus) are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 prefix ，则新的会话ID会以 prefix 为前缀。会话ID内不允许所有字符。允许使用az AZ 0-9之间的字符，（逗号）和-（减号）。

trans-unit.source: If privkeyfile is encrypted (which it should be), the passphrase must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果 privkeyfile 是加密的（应该加密），则必须提供 passphrase 。

trans-unit.source: If privkeyfile is encrypted (which it should be), the passphrase must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果 privkeyfile 是加密的（应该加密），则必须提供密码。

trans-unit.source: If q was invalid, then a SolrIllegalArgumentException is now thrown. Previously an error was emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 q 无效，则现在引发SolrIllegalArgumentException。以前发出了一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If qualifier is a single percent character (%) and owner and name are empty strings, then the result set contains a list of valid qualifiers for the data source. (All columns except the TABLE_QUALIFIER column contain NULLs.)
trans-unit.target: 如果 qualifier 是单个百分比字符（％），并且 owner 和 name 是空字符串，则结果集将包含该数据源的有效限定符列表。（除TABLE_QUALIFIER列以外的所有列均包含NULL。）

trans-unit.source: If query_data is an array, it may be a simple one-dimensional structure, or an array of arrays (which in turn may contain other arrays).
trans-unit.target: 如果 query_data 是一个数组，则它可以是简单的一维结构，也可以是数组的数组（而数组又可以包含其他数组）。

trans-unit.source: If query_data is an object, then only public properties will be incorporated into the result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 query_data 是对象，则仅将公共属性合并到结果中。

trans-unit.source: If recursive is TRUE any parent directories required for dirname will be automatically created as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果 recursive 为 TRUE ，则也会自动创建 dirname 所需的任何父目录。

trans-unit.source: If replace_pairs contains a key which is an empty string (""), FALSE will be returned. If the str is not a scalar then it is not typecasted into a string, instead a warning is raised and NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 replace_pairs 包含一个为空字符串（“”）的密钥，则将返回 FALSE 。如果 str 不是标量，则不会将其类型转换为字符串，而是会发出警告并返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If replacement array is specified, then the removed elements are replaced with elements from this array.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 replacement 数组，则使用此数组中的元素替换删除的元素。

trans-unit.source: If replacement is just one element it is not necessary to put array() around it, unless the element is an array itself, an object or NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 replacement 只是一个元素，则不必在其周围放置array（），除非该元素是数组本身，对象或 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If response_code is provided, then the previous status code will be returned. If response_code is not provided, then the current status code will be returned. Both of these values will default to a 200 status code if used in a web server environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 response_code ，则将返回先前的状态码。如果未提供 response_code ，则将返回当前状态码。如果在Web服务器环境中使用，则这两个值都将默认为200状态代码。

trans-unit.source: If result_id is 0, the settings apply as default for new results.
trans-unit.target: 如果 result_id 为0，则设置将默认应用于新结果。

trans-unit.source: If return is set to TRUE, returns the highlighted code as a string instead of printing it out. Otherwise, it will return TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果 return 设置为 TRUE ，则将突出显示的代码作为字符串返回，而不是打印出来。否则，成功返回 TRUE ，失败返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If row_number is not specified, odbc_fetch_row() will try to fetch the next row in the result set. Calls to odbc_fetch_row() with and without row_number can be mixed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 row_number ，则odbc_fetch_row（）将尝试获取结果集中的下一行。可以混合对具有和不具有 row_number 的odbc_fetch_row（）的调用。

trans-unit.source: If search and replace are arrays, then str_ireplace() takes a value from each array and uses them to search and replace on subject. If replace has fewer values than search, then an empty string is used for the rest of replacement values. If search is an array and replace is a string, then this replacement string is used for every value of search. The converse would not make sense, though.
trans-unit.target: 如果 search 和 replace 是数组，则str_ireplace（）从每个数组中获取一个值，并使用它们对 subject 进行搜索和替换。如果 replace 的值比 search 的值少，则将空字符串用于其余替换值。如果 search 是一个数组，而 replace 是一个字符串，则此替换字符串用于 search 的每个值。但是，相反没有道理。

trans-unit.source: If search and replace are arrays, then str_replace() takes a value from each array and uses them to search and replace on subject. If replace has fewer values than search, then an empty string is used for the rest of replacement values. If search is an array and replace is a string, then this replacement string is used for every value of search. The converse would not make sense, though.
trans-unit.target: 如果 search 和 replace 是数组，则str_replace（）从每个数组中获取一个值，并使用它们对 subject 进行搜索和替换。如果 replace 的值比 search 的值少，则将空字符串用于其余替换值。如果 search 是一个数组，而 replace 是一个字符串，则此替换字符串用于 search 的每个值。但是，相反没有道理。

trans-unit.source: If search or replace are arrays, their elements are processed first to last.
trans-unit.target: 如果 search 或 replace 是数组，则它们的元素将首先处理。

trans-unit.source: If size is greater than the number of bytes in the buffer, the function returns NULL. Otherwise, EventBuffer::pullup() returns string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 size 大于缓冲区中的字节数，则该函数返回 NULL 。否则，EventBuffer :: pullup（）返回字符串。

trans-unit.source: If size is larger than the file it is extended with null bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 size 大于文件，则将其扩展为空字节。

trans-unit.source: If size is larger than the file then the file is extended with null bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 size 大于文件大小，则文件将扩展为空字节。

trans-unit.source: If size is less than 1 E_WARNING will be thrown and NULL returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 size 小于1，则将引发 E_WARNING 并返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If size is smaller than the file then the file is truncated to that size.
trans-unit.target: 如果 size 小于文件，则文件将被截断为该大小。

trans-unit.source: If size is smaller than the file, the extra data will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果 size 小于文件，则多余的数据将丢失。

trans-unit.source: If spool is less than 2, the JPEG will be returned, or FALSE on failure. Otherwise returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果 spool 小于2，则将返回JPEG，否则将返回 FALSE 。否则，如果成功，则返回 TRUE ； FALSE 失败，则返回FALSE。

trans-unit.source: If start and length are omitted, then all of subject will be examined. If they are included, then the effect will be the same as calling strcspn(substr($subject, $start, $length), $mask) (see substr for more information).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 start 和 length ，则将检查所有 subject 。如果包含它们，则效果将与调用strcspn（substr（$ subject，$ start，$ length），$ mask）相同（有关更多信息，请参见substr）。

trans-unit.source: If start and length are omitted, then all of subject will be examined. If they are included, then the effect will be the same as calling strspn(substr($subject, $start, $length), $mask) (see substr for more information).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 start 和 length ，则将检查所有 subject 。如果包含它们，则效果将与调用strspn（substr（$ subject，$ start，$ length），$ mask）相同（有关更多信息，请参见substr）。

trans-unit.source: If start is given and is negative, then strcspn() will begin examining subject at the start'th position from the end of subject.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start ，并给出为否定，则strcspn（）将开始检查 subject 在 start “从结束个位置 subject 。

trans-unit.source: If start is given and is negative, then strspn() will begin examining subject at the start'th position from the end of subject.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start ，并给出为否定，则strspn（）将开始检查 subject 在 start “从结束个位置 subject 。

trans-unit.source: If start is given and is non-negative, then strcspn() will begin examining subject at the start'th position. For instance, in the string 'abcdef', the character at position 0 is 'a', the character at position 2 is 'c', and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 start 且非负数，则strcspn（）将在第th个 start 位置开始检查 subject 。例如，在字符串“ abcdef ”中，位置0处的字符是“ a ”，位置2处的字符是“ c ”，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If start is given and is non-negative, then strspn() will begin examining subject at the start'th position. For instance, in the string 'abcdef', the character at position 0 is 'a', the character at position 2 is 'c', and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 start 且非负数，则strspn（）将在第th个 start 位置开始检查 subject 。例如，在字符串“ abcdef ”中，位置0处的字符是“ a ”，位置2处的字符是“ c ”，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If start is negative, the replacing will begin at the start'th character from the end of string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 为负，则替换将从 string 的末尾的第'th个字符 start 。

trans-unit.source: If start is negative, the returned string will start at the start'th byte from the end of str.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 为负，则返回的字符串将从 str 的末尾的第一个字节 start 。

trans-unit.source: If start is negative, the returned string will start at the start'th character from the end of str.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 为负，则返回的字符串将从 str 的末尾的第一个字符 start 。

trans-unit.source: If start is negative, the returned string will start at the start'th character from the end of string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 为负，则返回的字符串将从 string 的末尾的第'th个字符 start 。

trans-unit.source: If start is non-negative, the replacing will begin at the start'th offset into string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 非负，替换将开始在 start “日进抵消 string 。

trans-unit.source: If start is non-negative, the returned string will start at the start'th byte position in str, counting from zero. For instance, in the string 'abcdef', the byte at position 0 is 'a', the byte at position 2 is 'c', and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 为非负数，则返回的字符串将从 str 的第 start 字节位置开始，从零开始计数。例如，在字符串“ abcdef ”中，位置0的字节为“ a ”，位置2的字节为“ c ”，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If start is non-negative, the returned string will start at the start'th position in str, counting from zero. For instance, in the string 'abcdef', the character at position 0 is 'a', the character at position 2 is 'c', and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 为非负数，则返回的字符串将从 str 中的第 start 个位置开始，从零开始计数。例如，在字符串“ abcdef ”中，位置0处的字符是“ a ”，位置2处的字符是“ c ”，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If start is non-negative, the returned string will start at the start'th position in string, counting from zero. For instance, in the string 'abcdef', the character at position 0 is 'a', the character at position 2 is 'c', and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 非负，返回的字符串将在开始 start “中日位置 string ，从零开始计数。例如，在字符串“ abcdef ”中，位置0处的字符是“ a ”，位置2处的字符是“ c ”，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If start_index is negative, the first index of the returned array will be start_index and the following indices will start from zero (see example).
trans-unit.target: 如果 start_index 为负，则返回数组的第一个索引将为 start_index ，随后的索引将从零开始（请参见示例）。

trans-unit.source: If status is a string, this function prints the status just before exiting.
trans-unit.target: 如果 status 是字符串，则此函数将在退出前打印 status 。

trans-unit.source: If status is an integer, that value will be used as the exit status and not printed. Exit statuses should be in the range 0 to 254, the exit status 255 is reserved by PHP and shall not be used. The status 0 is used to terminate the program successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果 status 是一个整数，则该值将用作退出状态并且不打印。退出状态应在0到254之间，退出状态255由PHP保留，不得使用。状态0用于成功终止程序。

trans-unit.source: If str is equal to offset characters long, an empty string will be returned. Prior to this version, FALSE was returned in this case.
trans-unit.target: 如果 str 等于 offset 字符长，则将返回一个空字符串。在此版本之前，在这种情况下返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If str is shorter than offset characters long, FALSE will be returned. If str is exactly offset characters long, an empty string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 str 短于 offset 字符，则返回 FALSE 。如果 str 恰好是 offset 字符，则将返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If string is equal to start characters long, an empty string will be returned. Prior to this version, FALSE was returned in this case.
trans-unit.target: 如果 string 等于 start 字符长，则将返回一个空字符串。在此版本之前，在这种情况下返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If string is less than start characters long, FALSE will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 string 少于 start 字符的长度，则将返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If subject is an array, then the search and replace is performed on every entry of subject, and the return value is an array as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果 subject 是一个数组，则对 subject 的每个条目执行搜索和替换，并且返回值也是一个数组。

trans-unit.source: If subject is an array, then the search and replace is performed with every entry of subject, and the return value is an array as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果 subject 是一个数组，则对 subject 的每个条目执行搜索和替换，并且返回值也是一个数组。

trans-unit.source: If substchar is set, it returns TRUE for success, otherwise returns FALSE. If substchar is not set, it returns the current setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 substchar ，则返回 TRUE 表示成功，否则返回 FALSE 。如果未设置 substchar ，则返回当前设置。

trans-unit.source: If table_type is a single percent character (%) and qualifier, owner and name are empty strings, then the result set contains a list of valid table types for the data source. (All columns except the TABLE_TYPE column contain NULLs.)
trans-unit.target: 如果 table_type 是单个百分比字符（％），并且 qualifier ， owner 和 name 是空字符串，那么结果集将包含该数据源的有效表类型的列表。（除TABLE_TYPE列以外的所有列均包含NULL。）

trans-unit.source: If table_type is not an empty string, it must contain a list of comma-separated values for the types of interest; each value may be enclosed in single quotes (') or unquoted. For example, "'TABLE','VIEW'" or "TABLE, VIEW". If the data source does not support a specified table type, odbc_tables() does not return any results for that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 table_type 不是空字符串，则必须包含感兴趣类型的逗号分隔值列表；每个值都可以用单引号（'）引起来，也可以不加引号。例如，“'TABLE'，'VIEW'”或“ TABLE，VIEW”。如果数据源不支持指定的表类型，则odbc_tables（）不会返回该类型的任何结果。

trans-unit.source: If time contains an invalid date/time format, then an exception is now thrown. Previously an error was emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 time 包含无效的日期/时间格式，则将引发异常。以前发出了一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If timeout is not provided or evaluates to -1, the current timeout value of timeout_type is returned as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 timeout 或其值为-1，则将 timeout_type 的当前超时值作为整数返回。

trans-unit.source: If timezone is omitted and time contains no timezone, the current timezone will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 timezone 省略和 time 不包含的时区，当前时区将被使用。

trans-unit.source: If tv_sec is NULLstream_select() can block indefinitely, returning only when an event on one of the watched streams occurs (or if a signal interrupts the system call).
trans-unit.target: 如果 tv_sec 为 NULL , stream_select（）可以无限期地阻塞，仅在其中一个被监视的流上发生事件时（或信号中断系统调用时）返回。

trans-unit.source: If type is IMG_AFFINE_ROTATE, IMG_AFFINE_SHEAR_HORIZONTAL or IMG_AFFINE_SHEAR_VERTICAL, options has to be a float specifying the angle.
trans-unit.target: 如果 type 为 IMG_AFFINE_ROTATE ， IMG_AFFINE_SHEAR_HORIZONTAL 或 IMG_AFFINE_SHEAR_VERTICAL ，则 options 必须为浮点数，用于指定角度。

trans-unit.source: If type is IMG_AFFINE_TRANSLATE or IMG_AFFINE_SCALE, options has to be an array with keys x and y, both having float values.
trans-unit.target: 如果 type 为 IMG_AFFINE_TRANSLATE 或 IMG_AFFINE_SCALE ，则 options 必须是具有键x和y的数组，键x和y都具有浮点值。

trans-unit.source: If type is omitted or set to "all", iconv_get_encoding() returns an array that stores all these variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 type 省略或设置为“ all”，则iconv_get_encoding（）返回存储所有这些变量的数组。

trans-unit.source: If type is specified as "http_output", "http_input", "internal_encoding", "func_overload", the specified setting parameter will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 type 指定为“ http_output”，“ http_input”，“ internal_encoding”，“ func_overload”，则将返回指定的设置参数。

trans-unit.source: If type isn't specified or is specified to "all", an array having the elements "internal_encoding", "http_output", "http_input", "func_overload", "mail_charset", "mail_header_encoding", "mail_body_encoding" will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 type 未指定或指定为“all”，一个阵列具有元素“internal_encoding”，“http_output”，“http_input”，“func_overload”，“mail_charset”，“mail_header_encoding”，“mail_body_encoding”将被返回。

trans-unit.source: If unserialize is FALSE, the message will be returned as a binary-safe string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 unserialize 为 FALSE ，则消息将作为二进制安全字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: If value is NULL, it is always treated as SQLITE3_NULL, regardless of the given type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 为 NULL ，则无论给定 type 如何，始终将其视为 SQLITE3_NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If whence is not specified, it is assumed to be SEEK_SET.
trans-unit.target: 如果 whence 没有指定，它被认为是 SEEK_SET 。

trans-unit.source: If who is 1, getrusage will be called with RUSAGE_CHILDREN.
trans-unit.target: 如果 who 是1，则将使用 RUSAGE_CHILDREN 调用getrusage 。

trans-unit.source: If 0 is passed, the entire output of the supplied algorithm is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了0，则使用所提供算法的整个输出。

trans-unit.source: If exceptions is not set then SOAP call will throw an exception on error. is_soap_fault() checks if the given parameter is a SoapFault object.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置例外，则SOAP调用将在错误时引发例外。is_soap_fault（）检查给定参数是否为SoapFault对象。

trans-unit.source: If one_way is set to 1, this method returns nothing. Use this where a response is not expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果one_way设置为1，则此方法不返回任何内容。在不需要响应的地方使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: If options is specified, pg_convert() is applied to assoc_array with the specified flags.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了options，则pg_convert（）将使用指定的标志应用于assoc_array。

trans-unit.source: If CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER is an option that is set for a specific handle, then this function will return the content of that cURL handle in the form of a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER 是为特定句柄设置的选项，则此函数将以字符串形式返回该cURL句柄的内容。

trans-unit.source: If EV_SIGNAL bit is set in parameter events, the fd is interpreted as signal number.
trans-unit.target: 如果在参数 events EV_SIGNAL 位置1 ，则 fd 解释为信号编号。

trans-unit.source: If FALSE, only activate the watcher when the process terminates. Otherwise(TRUE) additionally activate the watcher when the process is stopped or continued.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 FALSE ，则仅在过程终止时激活监视程序。否则，当过程停止或继续时，（ TRUE ）会另外激活监视程序。

trans-unit.source: If FALSE, the full path on disk to the phar archive is returned. If TRUE, a full phar URL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 FALSE ，则返回磁盘上指向phar归档文件的完整路径。如果为 TRUE ，则返回完整的phar URL。

trans-unit.source: If NULL is given for timezone, the timezone identifier given by date_default_timezone_get() will be used instead of ICUʼs default.
trans-unit.target: 如果 NULL ，给出了 timezone ，通过给出的时区标识符date_default_timezone_get（）将被用来代替ICU's默认。

trans-unit.source: If PGSQL_CONNECT_ASYNC is given, then the connection is established asynchronously. The state of the connection can then be checked via pg_connect_poll() or pg_connection_status().
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 PGSQL_CONNECT_ASYNC ，则异步建立连接。然后可以通过pg_connect_poll（）或pg_connection_status（）检查连接状态。

trans-unit.source: If PGSQL_CONNECT_FORCE_NEW is passed, then a new connection is created, even if the connection_string is identical to an existing connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了 PGSQL_CONNECT_FORCE_NEW ，则即使 connection_string 与现有连接相同，也会创建一个新连接。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE cookie will only be sent over secure connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ,将仅通过安全连接发送cookie 。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE later operations take effect inside clipping path. Otherwise later operations take effect outside clipping path.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ,则后续操作在剪切路径内生效。否则，以后的操作将在剪切路径之外生效。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE paints any pixel that does not match the target color.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ,则绘制与目标颜色不匹配的任何像素。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE the old RDN value(s) is removed, else the old RDN value(s) is retained as non-distinguished values of the entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则删除旧的RDN值，否则将旧的RDN值保留为条目的未区分值。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE then the raw output is appended to the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ,则原始输出将附加到数组。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, stristr() returns the part of the haystack before the first occurrence of the needle (excluding needle).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则stristr（）返回第一次出现 needle （不包括针）之前的 haystack 部分。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, strstr() returns the part of the haystack before the first occurrence of the needle (excluding the needle).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则strstr（）返回第一次出现 needle （不包括针）之前的 haystack 部分。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, an alternative decompression algorithm will be used which uses less memory (the maximum memory requirement drops to around 2300K) but works at roughly half the speed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则将使用替代的解压缩算法，该算法使用较少的内存（最大内存需求降至2300K左右），但速度大约是一半。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, grapheme_strstr() returns the part of the haystack before the first occurrence of the needle (excluding needle).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则grapheme_strstr（）返回第一次出现针（不包括针）之前的干草堆部分。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, grapheme_strstr() returns the part of the haystack before the first occurrence of the needle (excluding the needle).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，grapheme_strstr（）返回第一次出现针（不包括针）之前的干草堆部分。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the passive mode is turned on, else it's turned off.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，那么将启用被动模式，否则将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, then a field will only be highlighted if the query matched in this particular field.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则仅当查询在此特定字段中匹配时，该字段才会突出显示。

trans-unit.source: If Event::add() is called on an already pending event, libevent will leave it pending and re-schedule it with the given timeout(if specified). If in this case timeout is not specified, Event::add() has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果在一个已经挂起的事件上调用Event :: add（），则libevent将使其挂起，并使用给定的超时（如果指定）重新安排它。如果在这种情况下未指定超时，则Event :: add（）无效。

trans-unit.source: If __isset() is not provided, then an empty array will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供__isset（），则将返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: If get_class() is called with anything other than an object, an E_WARNING level error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果用对象以外的任何方法调用get_class（），则会引发 E_WARNING 级错误。

trans-unit.source: If getrusage() is called with who set to 1 (RUSAGE_CHILDREN), then resource usage for threads are collected (meaning that internally the function is called with RUSAGE_THREAD).
trans-unit.target: 如果在 who 设置为1（ RUSAGE_CHILDREN ）的情况下调用getrusage（），则将收集线程的资源使用情况（这意味着在内部使用 RUSAGE_THREAD 调用该函数）。

trans-unit.source: If $arr doesn't exist yet, it will be created, so this is also an alternative way to create an array. This practice is however discouraged because if $arr already contains some value (e.g. string from request variable) then this value will stay in the place and [] may actually stand for string access operator. It is always better to initialize a variable by a direct assignment.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $arr 还不存在，它将被创建，因此这也是创建array的另一种方法。但是不建议这样做，因为如果 $arr 已经包含某个值（例如，来自请求变量的字符串），则该值将保留在该位置，并且[]实际上可以代表字符串访问运算符。总是最好通过直接赋值来初始化变量。

trans-unit.source: If $_SESSION is used, assign values to $_SESSION. For example: $_SESSION['var'] = 'ABC';
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 $_SESSION ，则将值分配给 $_SESSION 。例如：$ _SESSION ['var'] ='ABC';

trans-unit.source: If $_SESSION is used, use isset() to check a variable is registered in $_SESSION.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 $_SESSION ，请使用isset（）检查变量是否已在 $_SESSION 注册。

trans-unit.source: If $_SESSION is used, use unset() to unregister a session variable, i.e. unset ($_SESSION['varname']);.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 $_SESSION ，请使用unset（）取消注册会话变量，即未设置（$ _SESSION ['varname']）; 。

trans-unit.source: If $_SESSION is used, use unset() to unregister a session variable. Do not unset()$_SESSION itself as this will disable the special function of the $_SESSION superglobal.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 $_SESSION ，请使用unset（）取消注册会话变量。请勿unset（） $_SESSION 本身，因为这将禁用 $_SESSION 超全局变量的特殊功能。

trans-unit.source: If <var><var>l_onoff</var></var> is non-zero and <var><var>l_linger</var></var> is zero, all the unsent data will be discarded and RST (reset) is sent to the peer in the case of a connection-oriented socket.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <var><var>l_onoff</var></var> 为非零且 <var><var>l_linger</var></var> 为零，则在面向连接的套接字的情况下，所有未发送的数据将被丢弃，并且RST（复位）被发送到对等方。

trans-unit.source: If I don't use namespaces, should I care about any of this?
trans-unit.target: 如果我不使用命名空间,我应该关心这些吗?

trans-unit.source: If OpenSSL support is installed, you may prefix the hostname with either ssl:// or tls:// to use an SSL or TLS client connection over TCP/IP to connect to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了 OpenSSL支持，则可以为 hostname 加上ssl：//或tls：//前缀，以使用通过TCP / IP的SSL或TLS客户端连接来连接到远程主机。

trans-unit.source: If PHP encounters a number beyond the bounds of the integer type, it will be interpreted as a float instead. Also, an operation which results in a number beyond the bounds of the integer type will return a float instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP遇到一个超出整数类型范围的数字，它将被解释为浮点数。同样，导致数字超出整数类型范围的运算将改为返回浮点数。

trans-unit.source: If PHP has mbstring support, the user comment can automatically change encoding. Also, if the user comment uses Unicode or JIS encoding this encoding will automatically be changed according to the exif ini settings in php.ini
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP 支持mbstring，则用户注释可以自动更改编码。另外，如果用户注释使用Unicode或JIS编码，则此编码将根据 php.ini 中的exif ini设置自动更改。

trans-unit.source: If PHP has been compiled with --enable-sigchild, the return value of this function is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP在编译时使用了--enable-sigchild,那么这个函数的返回值是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: If PHP has decided that filename specifies a local file, then it will try to open a stream on that file. The file must be accessible to PHP, so you need to ensure that the file access permissions allow this access. If you have enabled safe mode or open_basedir further restrictions may apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP决定 filename 指定了本地文件，则它将尝试在该文件上打开流。PHP必须可以访问该文件，因此您需要确保文件访问权限允许该访问。如果您启用了安全模式或open_basedir，则可能会有其他限制。

trans-unit.source: If PHP has decided that filename specifies a registered protocol, and that protocol is registered as a network URL, PHP will check to make sure that allow_url_fopen is enabled. If it is switched off, PHP will emit a warning and the fopen call will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP决定 filename 指定了已注册的协议，并且该协议已注册为网络URL，则PHP将检查以确保allow_url_fopen已启用。如果关闭它，PHP将发出警告，并且fopen调用将失败。

trans-unit.source: If PHP is running in a SAPI such as Fast CGI, this function will always return the value of an environment variable set by the SAPI, even if putenv() has been used to set a local environment variable of the same name. Use the local_only parameter to return the value of locally-set environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP在诸如Fast CGI之类的SAPI中运行，则此函数将始终返回由SAPI设置的环境变量的值，即使已使用putenv（）设置了相同名称的本地环境变量也是如此。使用 local_only 参数返回本地设置的环境变量的值。

trans-unit.source: If PHP's default error handling is inadequate, you can also handle many types of error with your own custom error handler by installing it with set_error_handler(). While some error types cannot be handled this way, those that can be handled can then be handled in the way that your script sees fit: for example, this can be used to show a custom error page to the user and then report more directly than via a log, such as by sending an e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 如果PHP的默认错误处理不充分，您还可以通过使用set_error_handler（）安装它来使用自己的自定义错误处理程序来处理许多类型的错误。尽管某些错误类型无法用这种方式处理，但是可以按照脚本认为合适的方式处理那些可以处理的错误：例如，可以将其用于向用户显示自定义错误页面，然后比通过日志（例如发送电子邮件）。

trans-unit.source: If SolrQuery::TERMS_SORT_COUNT, sorts the terms by the term frequency (highest count first). If SolrQuery::TERMS_SORT_INDEX, returns the terms in index order
trans-unit.target: 如果SolrQuery::TERMS_SORT_COUNT,则按术语频率排序(最高计数优先)。如果SolrQuery::TERMS_SORT_INDEX,按索引顺序返回术语。

trans-unit.source: If SolrQuery::setHighlightAlternateField() was passed the value TRUE, this parameter specifies the maximum number of characters of the field to return
trans-unit.target: 如果为SolrQuery :: setHighlightAlternateField（）传递了值 TRUE ，则此参数指定要返回的字段的最大字符数

trans-unit.source: If a DateTime or an IntlCalendar object is passed, its timezone is not considered. The object will be formatted using the formaterʼs configured timezone. If one wants to use the timezone of the object to be formatted, IntlDateFormatter::setTimeZone() must be called before with the objectʼs timezone. Alternatively, the static function IntlDateFormatter::formatObject() may be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了DateTime或IntlCalendar对象，则不考虑其时区。将使用格式化程序的配置时区对对象进行格式化。如果要使用要格式化的对象的时区，则必须在使用对象的时区之前调用IntlDateFormatter :: setTimeZone（）。另外，也可以使用静态函数IntlDateFormatter :: formatObject（）。

trans-unit.source: If a callable is given, it must implement the following signature:
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了callable，则它必须实现以下签​​名：

trans-unit.source: If a resource is converted to an integer, then the result will be the unique resource number assigned to the resource by PHP at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 如果将资源转换为整数，那么结果将是PHP在运行时分配给该资源的唯一资源编号。

trans-unit.source: If a string containing the name of a class is used with new, a new instance of that class will be created. If the class is in a namespace, its fully qualified name must be used when doing this.
trans-unit.target: 如果将包含类名称的字符串与new一起使用，则将创建该类的新实例。如果该类位于名称空间中，则在执行此操作时必须使用其完全限定名称。

trans-unit.source: If a step value is given, it will be used as the increment between elements in the sequence. step should be given as a positive number. If not specified, step will default to 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出 step 值，它将用作序列中元素之间的增量。 step 应为正数。如果未指定，则 step 将默认为1。

trans-unit.source: If a callback is not provided, only values which are TRUE (see converting to boolean) will be included.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供回调，则仅包含 TRUE 值（请参阅转换为boolean）。

trans-unit.source: If a character is used in the string which is not supported by the font, a hollow rectangle will replace the character.
trans-unit.target: 如果在字符串中使用了一个字体不支持的字符,则会用一个空心的矩形代替该字符。

trans-unit.source: If a child as requested by pid has already exited by the time of the call (a so-called "zombie" process), the function returns immediately. Any system resources used by the child are freed. Please see your system's waitpid(2) man page for specific details as to how waitpid works on your system.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pid 请求的孩子在调用时已经退出（所谓的“僵尸”进程），则该函数将立即返回。子级使用的所有系统资源都将被释放。请参见系统的waitpid（2）手册页，以获取关于waitpid如何在系统上工作的特定详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If a class extends the built-in Exception class and re-defines the constructor, it is highly recommended that it also call parent::__construct() to ensure all available data has been properly assigned. The __toString() method can be overridden to provide a custom output when the object is presented as a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个类扩展了内置的Exception类并重新定义了构造函数，则强烈建议它还调用parent :: __ construct（），以确保正确分配了所有可用数据。的__toString（）方法可以被重写，以提供一个自定义的输出时，对象被呈现为一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a class name is specified with the optional $className parameter and the class has properties whose names match the result set field names, the corresponding result set values are applied to the properties. If a result set field name does not match a class property, a property with the result set field name is added to the object and the result set value is applied to the property. The following rules apply when using the $className parameter:
trans-unit.target: 如果用可选的$className参数指定了一个类名,并且该类的属性名与结果集字段名相匹配,那么相应的结果集值将被应用到属性上。如果结果集字段名与类属性不匹配,则会向对象添加一个具有结果集字段名的属性,并将结果集值应用于该属性。当使用$className参数时,以下规则适用。

trans-unit.source: If a column with no name is returned, the associative key for the array element will be an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果返回一个没有名字的列,数组元素的关联键将是一个空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: If a connection opened by fsockopen() wasn't closed by the server, feof() will hang. To workaround this, see below example:
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器未关闭由fsockopen（）打开的连接，则feof（）将挂起。要解决此问题，请参见以下示例：

trans-unit.source: If a dollar sign ($) is encountered, the parser will greedily take as many tokens as possible to form a valid variable name. Enclose the variable name in curly braces to explicitly specify the end of the name.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到美元符号（$），则解析器将贪婪地获取尽可能多的令牌，以形成有效的变量名。用大括号将变量名称括起来，以明确指定名称的结尾。

trans-unit.source: If a download exceeds this speed (counted in bytes per second) on cumulative average during the transfer, the transfer will pause to keep the average rate less than or equal to the parameter value. Defaults to unlimited speed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在传输过程中累计平均下载速度超过了这个速度(以每秒字节数计算),传输将暂停,以保持平均速率小于或等于参数值。默认为无限速度。

trans-unit.source: If a file is pure PHP code, it is preferable to omit the PHP closing tag at the end of the file. This prevents accidental whitespace or new lines being added after the PHP closing tag, which may cause unwanted effects because PHP will start output buffering when there is no intention from the programmer to send any output at that point in the script.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个文件是纯PHP代码,最好在文件末尾省略PHP结束标签。这可以防止在PHP结束标签后意外地添加空白或新行,这可能会造成不必要的影响,因为当程序员没有打算在脚本中发送任何输出时,PHP会开始输出缓冲。

trans-unit.source: If a generator is used with yield from, the yield from expression will also return any value returned by the inner generator.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成器与yield from一起使用，则yield from表达式还将返回内部生成器返回的任何值。

trans-unit.source: If a given nameChoice returns FALSE, then all larger values of nameChoice will return FALSE, with one exception: if FALSE is returned for IntlChar::SHORT_PROPERTY_NAME, then IntlChar::LONG_PROPERTY_NAME (and higher) may still return a non-FALSE value.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 nameChoice 返回 FALSE ，那么所有的值越大 nameChoice 将返回 FALSE ，但有一个例外：如果 FALSE 则返回 IntlChar::SHORT_PROPERTY_NAME ，然后 IntlChar::LONG_PROPERTY_NAME （或更高版本）仍然可以返回一个非 FALSE 值。

trans-unit.source: If a globalized variable is unset() inside of a function, only the local variable is destroyed. The variable in the calling environment will retain the same value as before unset() was called.
trans-unit.target: 如果全局变量在函数内部为unset（），则仅销毁局部变量。调用环境中的变量将保留与调用unset（）之前相同的值。

trans-unit.source: If a handler function is set to an empty string, or FALSE, the handler in question is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理程序函数设置为空字符串或 FALSE ，则将禁用相关处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If a length is given and is positive, the resulting deque will have up to that many values in it. If the length results in an overflow, only values up to the end of the deque will be included. If a length is given and is negative, the deque will stop that many values from the end. If a length is not provided, the resulting deque will contain all values between the index and the end of the deque.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的长度是正数,那么所产生的deque中最多包含这么多的值。如果长度为溢出,那么只有到deque结束为止的值才会被包含。如果给定的长度是负数,那么deque将停止从末端开始的数值。如果没有给定长度,那么产生的deque将包含从索引到deque结尾的所有值。

trans-unit.source: If a length is given and is positive, the resulting map will have up to that many pairs in it. If a length is given and is negative, the range will stop that many pairs from the end. If the length results in an overflow, only pairs up to the end of the map will be included. If a length is not provided, the resulting map will contain all pairs between the index and the end of the map.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定一个长度并且是正数,那么生成的图谱中最多有那么多对。如果给定的长度是负数,那么范围将从末尾开始,停止这么多对。如果长度导致溢出,那么只有到图谱末端的对才会被包含。如果没有提供长度,生成的地图将包含索引和地图末端之间的所有对。

trans-unit.source: If a length is given and is positive, the resulting sequence will have up to that many values in it. If the length results in an overflow, only values up to the end of the sequence will be included. If a length is given and is negative, the sequence will stop that many values from the end. If a length is not provided, the resulting sequence will contain all values between the index and the end of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定一个长度并且是正值,那么产生的序列中最多有这么多值。如果长度导致溢出,那么只有到序列末尾的值才会被包含。如果给定的长度是负数,序列将从末尾开始停止这么多值。如果没有给定长度,则产生的序列将包含从索引到序列末尾的所有值。

trans-unit.source: If a length is given and is positive, the resulting set will have up to that many values in it. If the length results in an overflow, only values up to the end of the set will be included. If a length is given and is negative, the set will stop that many values from the end. If a length is not provided, the resulting set will contain all values between the index and the end of the set.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定一个长度并且是正值,那么产生的集合中最多有这么多的值。如果给定的长度是溢出,那么只有到集合末尾的值才会被包含。如果给定的长度是负数,那么集合将从最后的数值开始停止。如果没有给定长度,结果集将包含索引和集尾之间的所有值。

trans-unit.source: If a length is given and is positive, the resulting vector will have up to that many values in it. If the length results in an overflow, only values up to the end of the vector will be included. If a length is given and is negative, the vector will stop that many values from the end. If a length is not provided, the resulting vector will contain all values between the index and the end of the vector.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定一个长度并且是正值,那么生成的向量中最多有这么多值。如果长度导致溢出,那么只有到向量末端的值才会被包含。如果给定的长度是负数,那么向量将从尾部开始停止取值。如果没有给定长度,生成的向量将包含索引和向量末端之间的所有值。

trans-unit.source: If a message received is longer than the length parameter, excess bytes may be discarded depending on the type of socket the message is received from (such as UDP).
trans-unit.target: 如果收到的消息长于 length 参数，则根据接收消息的套接字类型（例如UDP），可能会丢弃多余的字节。

trans-unit.source: If a new session name is supplied, session_name() modifies the HTTP cookie (and output content when session.transid is enabled). Once the HTTP cookie is sent, session_name() raises error. session_name() must be called before session_start() for the session to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了新的会话 name ，session_name（）会修改HTTP cookie（并在启用session.transid时输出内容）。发送HTTP cookie后，session_name（）引发错误。会话名称（）必须之前调用在session_start（）为会议正常工作。

trans-unit.source: If a path is defined — whether absolute (starting with a drive letter or \ on Windows, or / on Unix/Linux systems) or relative to the current directory (starting with . or ..) — the include_path will be ignored altogether. For example, if a filename begins with ../, the parser will look in the parent directory to find the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径定义-无论是绝对的（从驱动器盘符或\ Windows上，或/在Unix / Linux系统），或相对于当前目录（从。或..） -将包含路径将被完全忽略。例如，如果文件名以../开头，则解析器将在父目录中查找以找到请求的文件。

trans-unit.source: If a pattern is compiled with the PCRE_EXTENDED option, whitespace in the pattern (other than in a character class) and characters between a "#" outside a character class and the next newline character are ignored. An escaping backslash can be used to include a whitespace or "#" character as part of the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用PCRE_EXTENDED选项编译模式，则模式中的空格（字符类中的字符除外）以及字符类外部的“＃”与下一个换行符之间的字符将被忽略。转义的反斜杠可用于在模式中包含空格或“＃”字符。

trans-unit.source: If a pattern starts with .* or .{0,} and the PCRE_DOTALL option (equivalent to Perl's /s) is set, thus allowing the . to match newlines, then the pattern is implicitly anchored, because whatever follows will be tried against every character position in the subject string, so there is no point in retrying the overall match at any position after the first. PCRE treats such a pattern as though it were preceded by \A. In cases where it is known that the subject string contains no newlines, it is worth setting PCRE_DOTALL when the pattern begins with .* in order to obtain this optimization, or alternatively using ^ to indicate anchoring explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果模式以。*或。{0，开头，并且设置了PCRE_DOTALL选项（相当于Perl的/ s），则允许使用。为了匹配换行符，模式将被隐式锚定，因为将针对主题字符串中的每个字符位置尝试以下操作，因此在第一个位置之后的任何位置重试整体匹配是没有意义的。 PCRE对待这种模式，就好像它以\ A开头。在已知主题字符串不包含换行符的情况下，值得在模式以。*开头时设置PCRE_DOTALL以获得最佳化，或者使用^来明确表示锚定。

trans-unit.source: If a program is started with this function, in order for it to continue running in the background, the output of the program must be redirected to a file or another output stream. Failing to do so will cause PHP to hang until the execution of the program ends.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个程序是用这个函数启动的,为了让它继续在后台运行,程序的输出必须被重定向到一个文件或其他输出流。如果没有这样做,PHP将被挂起,直到程序执行结束。

trans-unit.source: If a script is executed with the CLI, as a relative path, such as <var>file.php</var> or <var>../file.php</var>, <var><var>$_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME']</var></var> will contain the relative path specified by the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果脚本CLI中被执行，作为相对路径，例如 <var>file.php</var> 或 <var>../file.php</var> ， <var><var>$_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME']</var></var> 将包含由用户指定的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: If a second call is made to pg_connect() with the same connection_string as an existing connection, the existing connection will be returned unless you pass PGSQL_CONNECT_FORCE_NEW as connect_type.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用与现有连接相同的 connection_string 再次调用pg_connect（），则除非您将 PGSQL_CONNECT_FORCE_NEW 传递为 connect_type ,否则将返回现有连接。

trans-unit.source: If a second call is made to pg_pconnect() with the same connection_string as an existing connection, the existing connection will be returned unless you pass PGSQL_CONNECT_FORCE_NEW as connect_type.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用与现有连接相同的 connection_string 再次调用pg_pconnect（），则除非您将 PGSQL_CONNECT_FORCE_NEW 传递为 connect_type ,否则将返回现有连接。

trans-unit.source: If a sequence name was not specified for the name parameter, PDO::lastInsertId() returns a string representing the row ID of the last row that was inserted into the database.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为 name 参数指定序列名称，则PDO :: lastInsertId（）返回一个字符串，该字符串表示插入数据库的最后一行的行ID。

trans-unit.source: If a sequence name was specified for the name parameter, PDO::lastInsertId() returns a string representing the last value retrieved from the specified sequence object.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 name 参数指定了序列名称，则PDO :: lastInsertId（）返回一个字符串，该字符串表示从指定序列对象中检索到的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: If a session fails to start, then FALSE is returned. Previously TRUE was returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果会话无法启动，则返回 FALSE 。以前返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: If a snippet cannot be generated because there were no matching terms, one can specify a field to use as the backup or default summary
trans-unit.target: 如果因为没有匹配的术语而无法生成片段,可以指定一个字段作为备份或默认的摘要。

trans-unit.source: If a socket resource is passed to this function, the last error which occurred on this particular socket is returned. If the socket resource is omitted, the error code of the last failed socket function is returned. The latter is particularly helpful for functions like socket_create() which don't return a socket on failure and socket_select() which can fail for reasons not directly tied to a particular socket. The error code is suitable to be fed to socket_strerror() which returns a string describing the given error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果将套接字资源传递给此函数，则返回在此特定套接字上发生的最后一个错误。如果省略套接字资源，则返回上一个失败的套接字函数的错误代码。后者对于像socket_create（）这样不会在失败时返回套接字的函数以及socket_select（）可能由于未直接绑定到特定套接字的原因而失败的函数特别有用。该错误代码适合馈送到socket_strerror（），该函数返回描述给定错误代码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a statement passed to mysqli_prepare() is one that produces a result set, mysqli_stmt_result_metadata() returns the result object that can be used to process the meta information such as total number of fields and individual field information.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给mysqli_prepare（）的语句产生一个结果集，则mysqli_stmt_result_metadata（）返回结果对象，该结果对象可用于处理元信息，例如字段总数和单个字段信息。

trans-unit.source: If a static variable is unset() inside of a function, unset() destroys the variable only in the context of the rest of a function. Following calls will restore the previous value of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果静态变量在函数内部为unset（），则unset（）仅在其余函数的上下文中销毁该变量。后续调用将恢复变量的先前值。

trans-unit.source: If a string is returned it is used as the internal file path. If FALSE is returned then webPhar() will send a HTTP 403 Denied Code.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回字符串，则将其用作内部文件路径。如果返回 FALSE ，则webPhar（）将发送HTTP 403拒绝代码。

trans-unit.source: If a trait defines a property then a class can not define a property with the same name unless it is compatible (same visibility and initial value), otherwise a fatal error is issued. Before PHP 7.0.0, defining a property in the class with the same visibility and initial value as in the trait, raised an E_STRICT notice.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个trait定义了一个属性,那么一个类就不能定义一个同名的属性,除非它是兼容的(相同的可见性和初始值),否则就会发出一个致命的错误。在 PHP 7.0.0 之前,在类中定义一个与 trait 中相同可见性和初始值的属性,会引起一个 E_STRICT 通知。

trans-unit.source: If a user defined error handler (set_error_handler()) is set $php_errormsg is only set if the error handler returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了用户定义的错误处理程序（set_error_handler（）），则仅当错误处理程序返回 FALSE 时才设置 $php_errormsg 。

trans-unit.source: If a user uses ob_gzhandler or similar with ob_start(), the function order is important for proper output. For example, ob_gzhandler must be registered before starting the session.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户使用ob_gzhandler或与ob_start（）类似的功能，则函数顺序对于正确输出很重要。例如，必须在开始会话之前注册ob_gzhandler。

trans-unit.source: If a value has several occurrences, the latest key will be used as its value, and all others will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个值有多次出现,最新的键将被用作它的值,而其他的键将被丢失。

trans-unit.source: If a value in the ini file contains any non-alphanumeric characters it needs to be enclosed in double-quotes (").
trans-unit.target: 如果ini文件中的值包含任何非字母数字字符,则需要用双引号(")括起来。

trans-unit.source: If a variable has been unset with unset(), it will no longer be set. isset() will return FALSE if testing a variable that has been set to NULL. Also note that a null character ("\0") is not equivalent to the PHP NULL constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用unset（）取消设置了变量，则将不再设置该变量。如果测试已设置为 NULL 的变量，则isset（）将返回 FALSE 。还要注意，空字符（“ \ 0”）不等同于PHP NULL 常量。

trans-unit.source: If a variable that is PASSED BY REFERENCE is unset() inside of a function, only the local variable is destroyed. The variable in the calling environment will retain the same value as before unset() was called.
trans-unit.target: 如果在函数内未通过PASSED BY REFERENCE的变量为set （），则仅销毁局部变量。调用环境中的变量将保留与调用unset（）之前相同的值。

trans-unit.source: If accessing the filename image is impossible getimagesize() will generate an error of level E_WARNING. On read error, getimagesize() will generate an error of level E_NOTICE.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法访问 filename 图像，则getimagesize（）将生成 E_WARNING 级别的错误。发生读取错误时，getimagesize（）将生成级别为 E_NOTICE 的错误。

trans-unit.source: If all four parameters are given, number will be formatted with decimals decimals, dec_point instead of a dot (".") before the decimals and thousands_sep instead of a comma (",") between every group of thousands.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有四个给定参数， number 将被格式化 decimals 小数， dec_point 代替小数前一个点（“‘）和 thousands_sep 各组之间成千上万，而不是逗号（’”）。

trans-unit.source: If an array is passed, its keys are the header names and its values are the respective header values.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递数组，则其键为标头名称，其值为相应的标头值。

trans-unit.source: If an integer between -128 and 255 inclusive is provided, it is interpreted as the ASCII value of a single character (negative values have 256 added in order to allow characters in the Extended ASCII range). Any other integer is interpreted as a string containing the decimal digits of the integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的整数介于-128和255之间（含-128和255），则将其解释为单个字符的ASCII值（负值添加256以允许扩展ASCII范围内的字符）。其他任何整数都解释为包含该整数的十进制数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If an object is converted to an array, the result is an array whose elements are the object's properties. The keys are the member variable names, with a few notable exceptions: integer properties are unaccessible; private variables have the class name prepended to the variable name; protected variables have a '*' prepended to the variable name. These prepended values have null bytes on either side. This can result in some unexpected behaviour:
trans-unit.target: 如果将对象转换为array，则结果为一个数组，其元素为对象的属性。键是成员变量名称，但有一些值得注意的例外：整数属性不可访问；私有变量的类名在变量名之前；受保护的变量在变量名前带有“ *”。这些前置值的任一侧都有空字节。这可能会导致一些意外的行为：

trans-unit.source: If an object is converted to an object, it is not modified. If a value of any other type is converted to an object, a new instance of the stdClass built-in class is created. If the value was NULL, the new instance will be empty. An array converts to an object with properties named by keys and corresponding values. Note that in this case before PHP 7.2.0 numeric keys have been inaccessible unless iterated.
trans-unit.target: 如果将对象转换为object，则不会对其进行修改。如果将任何其他类型的值转换为对象，则将创建stdClass内置类的新实例。如果该值为 NULL ，则新实例将为空。一个数组转换为对象与由键和对应的值的命名属性。请注意，在这种情况下，除非迭代，否则无法访问PHP 7.2.0之前的数字键。

trans-unit.source: If an enclosure character is contained in a field, it will be escaped by doubling it, unless it is immediately preceded by an escape_char.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段中包含 enclosure 字符，则将其加倍以对其进行转义，除非紧随其后的是 escape_char 。
