trans-unit.source: If an object_id is given the function will try to create a large object with this id, else a free object id is assigned by the server. The parameter was added in PHP 5.3 and relies on functionality that first appeared in PostgreSQL 8.1.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了 object_id ，该函数将尝试使用该ID创建一个大对象，否则服务器将分配一个空闲的对象ID。该参数是在PHP 5.3中添加的，并且依赖于PostgreSQL 8.1中首次出现的功能。

trans-unit.source: If an application is using sessions and uses session_register() to register objects, these objects are serialized automatically at the end of each PHP page, and are unserialized automatically on each of the following pages. This means that these objects can show up on any of the application's pages once they become part of the session. However, the session_register() is removed since PHP 5.4.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序使用会话并使用session_register（）注册对象，则这些对象在每个PHP页面的末尾会自动进行序列化，并在随后的每个页面上自动进行反序列化。这意味着这些对象一旦成为会话的一部分，便可以显示在应用程序的任何页面上。但是，自PHP 5.4.0起删除了session_register（）。

trans-unit.source: If an appropriate source of randomness cannot be found, an Exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法找到随机性的适当源，异常将被抛出。

trans-unit.source: If an array has indices that will be the same once run through this function (e.g. "keY" and "kEY"), the value that is later in the array will override other indices.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个数组的索引一旦通过此函数运行后将是相同的（例如“ keY ”和“ kEY ”），则该数组后面的值将覆盖其他索引。

trans-unit.source: If an empty array is passed, then FALSE will be returned and an E_WARNING error will be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了一个空数组，则将返回 FALSE 并发出 E_WARNING 错误。

trans-unit.source: If an empty string is passed as the filename or an empty file is named, a warning will be generated. This warning is not generated by libxml and cannot be handled using libxml's error handling functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果将空字符串作为 filename 传递或命名为空文件，则会生成警告。该警告不是libxml生成的，因此无法使用libxml的错误处理函数进行处理。

trans-unit.source: If an empty string is passed as the filename or an empty file is named, a warning will be generated. This warning is not generated by libxml and cannot be handled using libxml's error handling functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果将空字符串作为 filename 传递或命名为空文件，则会生成警告。该警告不是由libxml生成的，因此无法使用libxml的错误处理函数进行处理。

trans-unit.source: If an empty string is passed as the source, a warning will be generated. This warning is not generated by libxml and cannot be handled using libxml's error handling functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果将空字符串作为 source 传递，则会生成警告。该警告不是由libxml生成的，因此无法使用libxml的错误处理函数进行处理。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs you can store an error message in here
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误,你可以在这里存储一个错误信息。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, FALSE is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, fpassthru() returns FALSE. Otherwise, fpassthru() returns the number of characters read from handle and passed through to the output.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误，fpassthru（）返回 FALSE 。否则，fpassthru（）返回从 handle 读取并传递到输出的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, and FALSE is returned, details of the error can be retrieved using the pg_last_error() function if the connection is valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误并返回 FALSE ，则在连接有效的情况下，可以使用pg_last_error（）函数检索错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If an invalid domain or type is given, socket_create() defaults to AF_INET and SOCK_STREAM respectively and additionally emits an E_WARNING message.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了无效的 domain 或 type ，socket_create（）的默认值分别为 AF_INET 和 SOCK_STREAM ,并另外发出 E_WARNING 消息。

trans-unit.source: If an invalid length of bytes is given, an Error will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了无效的字节 length ，则将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: If an invalid encoding or option is passed to options, or the context couldn't be created, an error of level E_WARNING is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果将无效的编码或选项传递给 options ，或者无法创建上下文，则会生成级别为 E_WARNING 的错误。

trans-unit.source: If an invalid option is passed to options or the context couldn't be created, an error of level E_WARNING is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果将无效的选项传递给 options 或者无法创建上下文，则会生成 E_WARNING 级错误。

trans-unit.source: If an invalid or no cache_type is specified, information about the system cache (cached files) will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了无效或没有指定 cache_type ，则将返回有关系统缓存（缓存文件）的信息。

trans-unit.source: If an object is: A named reader-writer with an autounlock of FALSE, the object is locked for either reading or writing, and the PHP script concludes before the object is unlocked, then the underlying objects will end up in an inconsistent state.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个对象是。一个命名的读写器,自动锁定为FALSE,对象的读写都被锁定,而PHP脚本在对象解锁之前就结束了,那么底层的对象最终会处于不一致的状态。

trans-unit.source: If an object is: A named semaphore with an autounlock of FALSE, the object is locked, and the PHP script concludes before the object is unlocked, then the underlying semaphore will end up in an inconsistent state.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个对象是。一个命名的semaphore,自动锁定为FALSE,对象被锁定,而PHP脚本在对象解锁之前就结束了,那么底层的semaphore将最终处于不一致的状态。

trans-unit.source: If an option change occurs inside a subpattern, the effect is different. This is a change of behaviour in Perl 5.005. An option change inside a subpattern affects only that part of the subpattern that follows it, so (a(?i)b)c matches abc and aBc and no other strings (assuming PCRE_CASELESS is not used). By this means, options can be made to have different settings in different parts of the pattern. Any changes made in one alternative do carry on into subsequent branches within the same subpattern. For example, (a(?i)b|c) matches "ab", "aB", "c", and "C", even though when matching "C" the first branch is abandoned before the option setting. This is because the effects of option settings happen at compile time. There would be some very weird behaviour otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果子模式内发生选项更改，则效果会不同。这是Perl 5.005中行为的变化。子模式内部的选项更改仅影响其后的子模式部分，因此（a（？i）b）c匹配abc和aBc且不匹配其他字符串（假设未使用PCRE_CASELESS）。通过这种方式，可以使选项在模式的不同部分具有不同的设置。在一个替代方案中所做的任何更改都会继续进入同一子模式中的后续分支。例如，（a（？i）b | c）匹配“ ab”，“ aB”，“ c”和“ C”，即使匹配“ C”时，第一个分支在选项设置之前被放弃。这是因为选项设置的影响是在编译时发生的。否则会有一些很奇怪的行为。

trans-unit.source: If an upload exceeds this speed (counted in bytes per second) on cumulative average during the transfer, the transfer will pause to keep the average rate less than or equal to the parameter value. Defaults to unlimited speed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在传输过程中累计平均上传速度超过了这个速度(以每秒字节数计算),传输将暂停,以保持平均速率小于或等于参数值。默认为无限速度。

trans-unit.source: If and how //TRANSLIT works exactly depends on the system's iconv() implementation (cf. ICONV_IMPL). Some implementations are known to ignore //TRANSLIT, so the conversion is likely to fail for characters which are illegal for the out_charset.
trans-unit.target: // TRANSLIT是否以及如何工作完全取决于系统的iconv（）实现（请参阅 ICONV_IMPL ）。已知某些实现会忽略// TRANSLIT，因此对于 out_charset 非法的字符，转换很可能失败。

trans-unit.source: If any request invocation returns a non-zero value, returns that value. Otherwise, it returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何请求调用返回非零值，则返回该值。否则，它返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: If applicable, the bytes_max will be populated.
trans-unit.target: 如果适用，将填充 bytes_max 。

trans-unit.source: If applicable, the bytes_transferred will be populated.
trans-unit.target: 如果适用，将填充 bytes_transferred 。

trans-unit.source: If auto-commit is disabled (see odbc_autocommit()) and you call odbc_free_result() before committing, all pending transactions are rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了自动提交（请参阅odbc_autocommit（）），并且在提交之前调用odbc_free_result（），则所有未决的事务都会回滚。

trans-unit.source: If both pk_table and fk_table contain table names, odbc_foreignkeys() returns the foreign keys in the table specified in fk_table that refer to the primary key of the table specified in pk_table. This should be one key at most.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个 pk_table 和 fk_table 包含表名，odbc_foreignkeys（）返回表中指定的外键 fk_table 是指在指定的表的主键 pk_table 。这最多应该是一个关键。

trans-unit.source: If both operands for the &, | and ^ operators are strings, then the operation will be performed on the ASCII values of the characters that make up the strings and the result will be a string. In all other cases, both operands will be converted to integers and the result will be an integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果＆的两个操作数，|和^运算符是字符串，则将对组成字符串的字符的ASCII值执行该操作，结果将是字符串。在所有其他情况下，两个操作数都将转换为整数，并且结果将为整数。

trans-unit.source: If called from the global scope, then execution of the current script file is ended. If the current script file was included or required, then control is passed back to the calling file. Furthermore, if the current script file was included, then the value given to return will be returned as the value of the include call. If return is called from within the main script file, then script execution ends. If the current script file was named by the auto_prepend_file or auto_append_file configuration options in php.ini, then that script file's execution is ended.
trans-unit.target: 如果从全局范围调用，则结束当前脚本文件的执行。如果当前脚本文件包含 d或require d，则控制权将传递回调用文件。此外，如果当前脚本文件是包括 d，然后给予价值回报将返回的值包括呼叫。如果从主脚本文件中调用return，则脚本执行结束。如果当前的脚本文件被命名的auto_prepend_file或auto_append_file所配置选项 php.ini 文件，那么该脚本文件的执行结束。

trans-unit.source: If called from within a function, the return statement immediately ends execution of the current function, and returns its argument as the value of the function call. return also ends the execution of an eval() statement or script file.
trans-unit.target: 如果从函数内部调用，则return语句将立即结束当前函数的执行，并将其参数作为函数调用的值返回。return还可以结束eval（）语句或脚本文件的执行。

trans-unit.source: If called with full_status = TRUE an array with one element for each active output buffer level is returned. The output level is used as key of the top level array and each array element itself is another array holding status information on one active output level.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 full_status = TRUE 调用，则返回一个数组，其中每个活动输出缓冲区级别都有一个元素。输出级别用作顶级数组的键，每个数组元素本身是另一个在一个活动的输出级别上保存状态信息的数组。

trans-unit.source: If called with one argument, it returns the current value of note note_name. If called with two arguments, it sets the value of note note_name to note_value and returns the previous value of note note_name. If the note cannot be retrieved, FALSE is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用一个参数调用，它将返回note note_name的当前值。如果使用两个参数调用，它将注释note_name的值设置为note_value并返回注释note_name的前一个值。如果无法检索到笔记，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If called without an argument, this function commits the default transaction of the default link. If the argument is a connection identifier, the default transaction of the corresponding connection will be committed. If the argument is a transaction identifier, the corresponding transaction will be committed.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用该函数时没有参数,该函数将提交默认连接的默认事务。如果参数是连接标识符,则会提交相应连接的默认事务;如果参数是事务标识符,则会提交相应连接的默认事务。如果参数是事务标识符,则提交相应的事务。

trans-unit.source: If called without an argument, this function commits the default transaction of the default link. If the argument is a connection identifier, the default transaction of the corresponding connection will be committed. If the argument is a transaction identifier, the corresponding transaction will be committed. The transaction context will be retained, so statements executed from within this transaction will not be invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用该函数时没有参数,该函数将提交默认连接的默认事务。如果参数是连接标识符,则会提交相应连接的默认事务;如果参数是事务标识符,则会提交相应连接的默认事务。如果参数是一个事务标识符,那么相应的事务将被提交。事务的上下文将被保留,因此在这个事务中执行的语句不会失效。

trans-unit.source: If called without an argument, this function rolls back the default transaction of the default link. If the argument is a connection identifier, the default transaction of the corresponding connection will be rolled back. If the argument is a transaction identifier, the corresponding transaction will be rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有参数,这个函数会回滚默认连接的默认事务。如果参数是连接标识符,则会回滚相应连接的默认事务,如果参数是事务标识符,则会回滚相应连接的默认事务。如果参数是事务标识符,则会回滚相应事务的默认事务。

trans-unit.source: If called without an argument, this function rolls back the default transaction of the default link. If the argument is a connection identifier, the default transaction of the corresponding connection will be rolled back. If the argument is a transaction identifier, the corresponding transaction will be rolled back. The transaction context will be retained, so statements executed from within this transaction will not be invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有参数,这个函数会回滚默认连接的默认事务。如果参数是连接标识符,则会回滚相应连接的默认事务,如果参数是事务标识符,则会回滚相应连接的默认事务。如果参数是一个事务标识符,那么相应的事务将被回滚。事务的上下文将被保留,因此在这个事务中执行的语句不会失效。

trans-unit.source: If called without parameter outside object, this function returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果在没有外部参数的情况下调用此函数，则此函数返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If called without parameter outside object, this function would have returned NULL with a warning, but now returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果在没有外部对象参数的情况下调用此函数，则该函数将返回 NULL 并带有警告，但现在返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If called without the full_status parameter or with full_status = FALSE a simple array with the following elements is returned:
trans-unit.target: 如果在不使用 full_status 参数或 full_status = FALSE 的情况下调用，则返回包含以下元素的简单数组：

trans-unit.source: If called without the optional min, max arguments mt_rand() returns a pseudo-random value between 0 and mt_getrandmax(). If you want a random number between 5 and 15 (inclusive), for example, use mt_rand(5, 15).
trans-unit.target: 如果被叫没有可选 min ， max 参数mt_rand（）返回0和之间的伪随机值mt_getrandmax（） 。例如，如果要使用5到15（含）之间的随机数，请使用mt_rand（5，15）。

trans-unit.source: If converting to a phar-based archive, the default extensions are .phar, .phar.gz, or .phar.bz2 depending on the specified compression. trans-unit.source: If given a string, integer or float, the value itself will be printed. If given an array, values will be presented in a format that shows keys and elements. Similar notation is used for objects.

trans-unit.source: If given and is positive, it represents the length of the portion of string which is to be replaced. If it is negative, it represents the number of characters from the end of string at which to stop replacing. If it is not given, then it will default to strlen( string ); i.e. end the replacing at the end of string. Of course, if length is zero then this function will have the effect of inserting replacement into string at the given start offset.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定且为正，则表示要替换的 string 部分的长度。如果为负，则表示从 string 末尾开始要停止替换的字符数。如果未给出，则默认为strlen（ string ）;即在 string 的结尾处结束替换。当然，如果 length 为零，则此函数将具有在给定的 start 偏移量处将 replacement 插入 string 中的效果。

trans-unit.source: If given three arguments, this function returns a copy of str where all occurrences of each (single-byte) character in from have been translated to the corresponding character in to, i.e., every occurrence of $from[$n] has been replaced with $to[$n], where $n is a valid offset in both arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果有三个参数，这个函数返回的副本 str 其中每个（单字节）字符的所有匹配 from 已被翻译成相应的字符 to 的每一次出现，即从[$ N] $已被替换$ to [$ n]，其中$ n是两个参数中的有效偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If given two arguments, the second should be an array in the form array('from' => 'to', ...). The return value is a string where all the occurrences of the array keys have been replaced by the corresponding values. The longest keys will be tried first. Once a substring has been replaced, its new value will not be searched again.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的两个参数，第二应该是一个阵列的形式，阵列（“从” =>“到”，...） 。返回值是一个字符串，其中所有出现的数组键都已被相应的值替换。最长的键将首先尝试。替换子字符串后，将不再搜索其新值。

trans-unit.source: If given, this will hold the port associated to address.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，将保留与 address 关联的端口。

trans-unit.source: If grouping has not been suppressed using the ^ flag, grouping separators will be inserted before the fill characters (if any) are added. Grouping separators will not be applied to fill characters, even if the fill character is a digit.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未使用^标志抑制分组，则将在添加填充字符（如果有）之前插入分组分隔符。即使填充字符是数字，分组分隔符也不会应用于填充字符。

trans-unit.source: If inside a function, this lists the functions arguments. If inside an included file, this lists the included file name(s).

trans-unit.target: 如果匹配失败,将返回一个包含输入字符串的单一元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: If messages are not received, try using a LF (\n) only. Some Unix mail transfer agents (most notably » qmail) replace LF by CRLF automatically (which leads to doubling CR if CRLF is used). This should be a last resort, as it does not comply with » RFC 2822.
trans-unit.target: 如果未收到消息，请尝试仅使用LF（\ n）。一些Unix邮件传输代理（最著名是»qmail）会自动将CR替换为CRLF（如果使用CRLF，则会导致CR翻倍）。这应该是不得已的方法，因为它不符合»RFC 2822的要求。

trans-unit.source: If more than one argument is passed to this function, the remaining arguments will be treated as though you called PDOStatement::setFetchMode() on the resultant statement object.
trans-unit.target: 如果将多个参数传递给该函数，则其余的参数将被视为您在结果语句对象上调用了PDOStatement :: setFetchMode（）。

trans-unit.source: If no error handler is set, then PHP will handle any errors that occur according to its configuration. Which errors are reported and which are ignored is controlled by the error_reporting php.ini directive, or at runtime by calling error_reporting(). It is strongly recommended that the configuration directive be set, however, as some errors can occur before execution of your script begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置错误处理程序，则PHP将处理根据其配置发生的任何错误。报告哪些错误和忽略哪些错误由 error_reporting php.ini指令控制，或者在运行时通过调用error_reporting（）进行控制。强烈建议设置配置指令，但是，由于在开始执行脚本之前可能会发生一些错误。

trans-unit.target: 如果超出范围，或者此方法不适用于给定值，则返回 IntlChar::PROPERTY_INVALID_CODE 。

trans-unit.source: If output exists prior to calling this function, setcookie() will fail and return FALSE. If setcookie() successfully runs, it will return TRUE. This does not indicate whether the user accepted the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用此函数之前存在输出，则setcookie（）将失败并返回 FALSE 。如果setcookie（）成功运行，它将返回 TRUE 。这并不表示用户是否接受了cookie。

trans-unit.source: If parameters are used, they are referred to in the query string as $1, $2, etc. The same parameter may appear more than once in the query; the same value will be used in that case. params specifies the actual values of the parameters. A NULL value in this array means the corresponding parameter is SQL NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了参数，则它们在 query 字符串中称为$ 1，$ 2等。同一参数在 query 可能会出现多次；在这种情况下，将使用相同的值。 params 指定参数的实际值。甲 NULL 此数组中的值表示相应的参数是SQL NULL。

trans-unit.source: If passed into the function, this will hold a boolean value that determines if the algorithm used was "cryptographically strong", e.g., safe for usage with GPG, passwords, etc. TRUE if it did, otherwise FALSE
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给函数，则它将保留一个布尔值，该布尔值确定所使用的算法是否“具有加密强度”，例如，对于使用GPG，密码等可以安全使用。如果 TRUE 则为TRUE，否则为 FALSE

trans-unit.source: If passed, this will be set to the number of replacements performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过,将设置为执行替换的次数。

trans-unit.source: If positive, the deque will start at that index in the deque. If negative, the deque will start that far from the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果是正数,deque将从deque中的那个索引开始。如果是负数,deque将从末端开始。

trans-unit.source: If positive, the range will start at that index in the map. If negative, the range will start that far from the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果是正数,范围将从地图上的那个索引开始。如果是负数,范围将从终点开始。

trans-unit.source: If positive, the sequence will start at that index in the sequence. If negative, the sequence will start that far from the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果是正数,序列将从序列中的那个索引开始。如果是负数,则序列将从末端开始。

trans-unit.source: If positive, the set will start at that index in the set. If negative, the set will start that far from the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果是正数,则该集合将从该集合的那个索引开始。如果是负数,则该集合将从距离终点那么远的地方开始。

trans-unit.source: If positive, the vector will start at that index in the vector. If negative, the vector will start that far from the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果是正数,向量将从向量的那个索引开始。如果是负数,则向量将从终点开始。

trans-unit.source: If possible and supported, libev will install its handlers with SA_RESTART (or equivalent) behaviour enabled, so system calls should not be unduly interrupted. In case of a problem with system calls getting interrupted by signals, all the signals can be blocked in an EvCheck watcher and unblocked in a EvPrepare watcher.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能并得到支持，libev将在启用SA_RESTART（或等效功能）行为的情况下安装其处理程序，因此不应过度中断系统调用。与系统调用得到由信号中断的问题的情况下，所有的信号可以被阻塞在EvCheck观察者和畅通在EvPrepare观察者。

trans-unit.source: If present, it will make all fields left-justified (padded to the right), as opposed to the default which is for the fields to be right-justified (padded to the left).
trans-unit.target: 如果存在,它将使所有字段左对齐(向右填充),而不是默认的字段右对齐(向左填充)。

trans-unit.source: If present, specifies a specific element to be returned; one of PATHINFO_DIRNAME, PATHINFO_BASENAME, PATHINFO_EXTENSION or PATHINFO_FILENAME.

trans-unit.source: If present, the access time of the given filename is set to the value of atime. Otherwise, it is set to the value passed to the time parameter. If neither are present, the current system time is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则将给定文件名的访问时间设置为 atime 的值。否则，将其设置为传递给 time 参数的值。如果都不存在，则使用当前系统时间。

trans-unit.source: If provided or NULL, the MySQL server will attempt to authenticate the user against those user records which have no password only. This allows one username to be used with different permissions (depending on if a password as provided or not).
trans-unit.target: 如果提供或为 NULL ，则MySQL服务器将尝试根据仅没有密码的用户记录对用户进行身份验证。这允许一个用户名以不同的权限使用（取决于是否提供了密码）。

trans-unit.source: If provided then COMMIT/*name*/ is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则执行COMMIT / * name * /。

trans-unit.source: If provided then ROLLBACK/*name*/ is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则执行ROLLBACK / * name * /。

trans-unit.source: If provided will specify the default database to be used when performing queries.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供,将指定执行查询时使用的默认数据库。

trans-unit.source: If provided, holds the system level error number that occurred in the system-level connect() call.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则保存在系统级connect（）调用中发生的系统级错误号。

trans-unit.target: 如果提供的话，这些 options 也将写入 mailbox

trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则 CURLOPT_URL 选项将设置为其值。您可以使用curl_setopt（）函数手动设置它。

trans-unit.source: If provided, this is an associative array of options that will override the currently set session configuration directives. The keys should not include the session. prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的话，这是一个选项的关联数组，它将覆盖当前设置的会话配置指令。密钥不应包含会话。字首。

trans-unit.source: If provided, this will hold the associated port.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了,这将保留相关的端口。

trans-unit.source: If repeat is 0.0 , then it will automatically be stopped once the timeout is reached. If it is positive, then the timer will automatically be configured to trigger again every repeat seconds later, until stopped manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果repeat是 0.0 ，那么一旦达到超时，它将自动停止。如果为正，则计时器将自动配置为在每重复几秒钟后再次触发，直到手动停止为止。

trans-unit.source: If service threw exceptions, A Yar_Server_Exception will be threw in client side.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务出现异常,客户端会出现一个Yar_Server_Exception。

trans-unit.source: If session is not active, collision check is omitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果会话不活跃,则省略碰撞检查。

trans-unit.source: If set and TRUE, data is the last piece of data sent in this parse.

trans-unit.source: If set and non-zero, transparent colors are ignored (otherwise kept).

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 PREG_GREP_INVERT ，则此函数返回输入数组中与给定 pattern 不匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE numeric keys are preserved. Non-numeric keys are not affected by this setting and will always be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ,则保留数字键。非数字键不受此设置的影响，并且将始终保留。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE the remote socket name will be returned, if set to FALSE the local socket name will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，将返回远程套接字名称；如果设置为 FALSE ，将返回本地套接字名称。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE the function only verifies that name might be a function or method. It will only reject simple variables that are not strings, or an array that does not have a valid structure to be used as a callback. The valid ones are supposed to have only 2 entries, the first of which is an object or a string, and the second a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ,则该函数仅验证该 name 可能是函数或方法。它只会拒绝不是字符串的简单变量，或者拒绝没有有效结构用作回调的数组。有效条目应该只有2个条目，第一个条目是对象或字符串，第二个条目是字符串。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE the option will be enabled otherwise will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则将启用该选项，否则将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE then PHP will attempt to send the httponly flag when setting the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ,则PHP 在设置会话cookie时将尝试发送httponly标志。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, uniqid() will add additional entropy (using the combined linear congruential generator) at the end of the return value, which increases the likelihood that the result will be unique.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则uniqid（）将在返回值的末尾添加额外的熵（使用组合线性同余生成器），这增加了结果唯一的可能性。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, matching documents are excluded from the result set.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则匹配的文档将从结果集中排除。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, the constant will be defined case-insensitive. The default behavior is case-sensitive; i.e. CONSTANT and Constant represent different values.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则常量将定义为不区分大小写。默认行为区分大小写；即，常数和常数表示不同的值。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, the extension will be enabled automatically in all V8Js contexts.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，那么将在所有V8J上下文中自动启用扩展。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, the issued command will be LIST -R.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则发出的命令将为LIST -R。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, the message is treated as though it was serialized using the same mechanism as the session module. The message will be unserialized and then returned to your script. This allows you to easily receive arrays or complex object structures from other PHP scripts, or if you are using the WDDX serializer, from any WDDX compatible source.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则该消息将被视为使用与会话模块相同的机制进行了序列化。该消息将被反序列化，然后返回到您的脚本。这使您可以轻松地从其他PHP脚本中接收数组或复杂的对象结构，或者如果您正在使用WDDX序列化器，则可以从任何WDDX兼容的源中轻松接收该数组或复杂的对象结构。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, this function will return an array instead of an object.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则此函数将返回数组而不是对象。

trans-unit.source: If set, iconv_mime_decode_headers() attempts to ignore any grammatical errors and continue to process a given header.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，iconv_mime_decode_headers（）会尝试忽略任何语法错误并继续处理给定的标头。

trans-unit.source: If set, iconv_mime_decode_headers() attempts to ignore any grammatical errors and continue to process a given header.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，iconv_mime_decode_headers（）会尝试忽略任何语法错误并继续处理给定的标头。

trans-unit.source: If set, the given header is decoded in full conformance with the standards defined in » RFC2047. This option is disabled by default because there are a lot of broken mail user agents that don't follow the specification and don't produce correct MIME headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则完全按照»RFC2047中定义的标准对给定的标头进行解码。默认情况下，此选项是禁用的，因为有很多损坏的邮件用户代理不遵循规范，并且不会产生正确的MIME标头。

trans-unit.source: If set, this function will set the ignore_user_abort ini setting to the given value. If not, this function will only return the previous setting without changing it.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，此函数将把ignore_user_abort ini设置设置为给定 value 。如果不是，此功能将仅返回先前的设置而不更改它。

trans-unit.source: If set, this must be either a valid callback that will be passed the extracted section, or NULL to make this function return the extracted section.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则它必须是将传递给提取部分的有效回调，或者为 NULL 以使此函数返回提取的部分。

trans-unit.source: If socket is not assigned to the buffer event, this function allocates a new socket and makes it non-blocking internally.
trans-unit.target: 如果socket没有分配给缓冲区事件,这个函数会分配一个新的socket,并在内部使其成为非阻塞的。

trans-unit.source: If specified, it must be in dotted quad (or [ipv6]) format.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定,它必须是点阵四边形(或[ipv6])格式。

trans-unit.source: If specified, returns all namespaces declared in parent and child nodes. Otherwise, returns only namespaces declared in root node.

trans-unit.source: If specified, search will start this number of characters counted from the beginning of the string. If the offset is negative, the search will start this number of characters counted from the end of the string.

trans-unit.source: If specified, this should be the name of a PEM encoded file holding certificates that can be used to help verify the certificate, although no trust is placed in the certificates that come from that file.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了,这应该是一个PEM编码文件的名称,该文件可以用来帮助验证证书,尽管对来自该文件的证书并不信任。

trans-unit.source: If the PCRE_EXTENDED option is set, an unescaped # character outside a character class introduces a comment that continues up to the next newline character in the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了PCRE_EXTENDED选项，则字符类外部的非转义＃字符会引入注释，该注释会一直延续到模式中的下一个换行符。

trans-unit.source: If the PCRE_UNGREEDY option is set (an option which is not available in Perl) then the quantifiers are not greedy by default, but individual ones can be made greedy by following them with a question mark. In other words, it inverts the default behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了PCRE_UNGREEDY选项（Perl中不提供此选项），则默认情况下，量词不是贪婪的，但是可以在单个量词后面加上问号，从而使它们变得贪婪。换句话说，它会反转默认行为。

trans-unit.source: If the assertion is given as a string it will be evaluated as PHP code by assert(). If you pass a boolean condition as assertion, this condition will not show up as parameter to the assertion function which you may have defined with assert_options(). The condition is converted to a string before calling that handler function, and the boolean FALSE is converted as the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 assertion 是以字符串形式给出的，则将由assert（）将其评估为PHP代码。如果将布尔条件作为 assertion 传递，则此条件将不会显示为断言函数的参数，该函数可能已通过assert_options（）定义。在调用该处理函数之前，条件将转换为字符串，并且布尔值 FALSE 将转换为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the cainfo is specified, it should hold information about the trusted CA certificates to use in the verification process - see certificate verification for more information about this parameter.

trans-unit.source: If the component parameter is omitted, an associative array is returned. At least one element will be present within the array. Potential keys within this array are:
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 component 参数，则返回一个关联数组。阵列中将至少存在一个元素。该数组中的潜在键为：

trans-unit.source: If the component parameter is specified, parse_url() returns a string (or an integer, in the case of PHP_URL_PORT) instead of an array. If the requested component doesn't exist within the given URL, NULL will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 component 参数，则parse_url（）返回一个字符串（如果是 PHP_URL_PORT ，则返回一个整数）而不是一个array。如果所请求的组件在给定的URL中不存在，则将返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the cut is set to TRUE, the string is always wrapped at or before the specified width. So if you have a word that is larger than the given width, it is broken apart. (See second example). When FALSE the function does not split the word even if the width is smaller than the word width.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cut 设置为 TRUE ，则字符串总是以指定的 width 或之前的宽度包装。因此，如果您输入的字词大于给定的宽度，则会将其分开。（请参见第二个示例）。当为 FALSE 时，即使 width 小于单词宽度，该功能也不会拆分单词。

trans-unit.source: If the error_message parameter is used, it will contain the error message generated by the syntax check. error_message is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 error_message 参数，它将包含语法检查生成的错误消息。 error_message 通过引用传递。

trans-unit.source: If the expression is malformed or the contextnode is invalid, DOMXPath::evaluate() returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expression 格式错误或 contextnode 无效，则DOMXPath :: evaluate（）返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the expression is malformed or the contextnode is invalid, DOMXPath::query() returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expression 格式错误或 contextnode 无效，则DOMXPath :: query（）返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the extracerts is specified, it is the filename of a file containing a bunch of certificates to use as untrusted CAs.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 extracerts ，则它是包含一堆用作不受信任的CA的证书的文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If the filename isn't specified, this function returns a string on success and FALSE on error. If the parameter is specified, it returns TRUE if the file was written successfully and FALSE otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 filename ，则此函数在成功时返回字符串，而在错误时返回 FALSE 。如果指定了参数，则如果文件已成功写入，则返回 TRUE ，否则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the filename parameter is given, this function will also read that file and initialize the object with the file, acting like tidy_parse_file().
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 filename 参数，该函数还将读取该文件并使用该文件初始化该对象，就像tidy_parse_file（）一样。

trans-unit.source: If the filename parameter is given, this function will also read that file and initialize the object with the file, acting like tidy_parse_file().
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 filename 参数，该函数还将读取该文件并使用该文件初始化该对象，就像tidy_parse_file（）一样。

trans-unit.source: If the hebrew parameter is set to TRUE, the fl parameter is used for Hebrew, ISO-8859-8 encoded string based, output format.
trans-unit.target: 如果 hebrew 参数被设置为 TRUE 时， fl 参数用于希伯来语，ISO-8859-8编码的字符串基于输出格式。

trans-unit.source: If the initialize argument is TRUE, it tries to configure the DNS base sensibly given your operating system’s default. Otherwise, it leaves the event DNS base empty, with no nameservers or options configured. In the latter case DNS base should be configured manually, e.g. with EventDnsBase::parseResolvConf() .
trans-unit.target: 如果 initialize 参数为 TRUE ，则在给定操作系统默认值的情况下，它将尝试合理地配置DNS库。否则，它将事件DNS基础保留为空，没有配置名称服务器或选项。在后一种情况下，应手动配置DNS库，例如，使用EventDnsBase :: parseResolvConf（）。

trans-unit.source: If the length argument is given, writing will stop after length bytes have been written or the end of string is reached, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 length 参数，则写入 length 字节或到达 string 末尾（以先到者为准）后，写入将停止。

trans-unit.source: If the limit parameter is negative, all components except the last -limit are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 limit 参数为负，则返回除last- limit 之外的所有组件。

trans-unit.source: If the limit parameter is zero, then this is treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果 limit 参数为零，则将其视为1。

trans-unit.source: If the object is an instance of a class which exists in a namespace, the qualified namespaced name of that class is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 object 是存在于名称空间中的类的实例，则返回该类的合格名称空间名称。

trans-unit.source: If the on parameter is omitted, pcntl_async_signals() returns whether asynchronous signal handling is enabled. Otherwise, asynchronous signal handling is enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 on 参数，则pcntl_async_signals（）返回是否启用了异步信号处理。否则，将启用或禁用异步信号处理。

trans-unit.source: If the optind parameter is present, then the index where argument parsing stopped will be written to this variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 optind 参数，则参数解析停止的索引将被写入此变量。

trans-unit.source: If the options parameter is not passed, an associative array containing the following elements is returned: dirname, basename, extension (if any), and filename.
trans-unit.target: 如果未传递 options 参数，则返回包含以下元素的关联数组：dirname，basename，扩展名（如果有）和filename。

trans-unit.source: If the outfilename is specified, it should be a string holding the name of a file into which the certificates of the persons that signed the messages will be stored in PEM format.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 outfilename ，则它应该是一个字符串，其中包含一个文件名，签名消息的人员的证书将以PEM格式存储在该文件中。

trans-unit.source: If the output argument is present, then the specified array will be filled with every line of output from the command. Trailing whitespace, such as \n, is not included in this array. Note that if the array already contains some elements, exec() will append to the end of the array. If you do not want the function to append elements, call unset() on the array before passing it to exec().
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 output 参数，则命令的输出的每一行都将填充指定的数组。尾随空格，例如\ n，不包含在此数组中。请注意，如果数组已经包含一些元素，则exec（）将追加到数组的末尾。如果您不希望函数追加元素，请在将数组传递给exec（）之前在数组上调用unset （）。

trans-unit.source: If the path does not have an extension, no extension element will be returned (see second example below).
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 没有扩展名，则不会返回扩展元素（请参见下面的第二个示例）。

trans-unit.source: If the path has more than one extension, PATHINFO_EXTENSION returns only the last one and PATHINFO_FILENAME only strips the last one. (see first example below).
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 具有多个扩展名，则 PATHINFO_EXTENSION 仅返回最后一个扩展名，而 PATHINFO_FILENAME 仅去除最后一个扩展名。（请参见下面的第一个示例）。

trans-unit.source: If the path is opened successfully, and STREAM_USE_PATH is set in options, opened_path should be set to the full path of the file/resource that was actually opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 被成功打开，并且 STREAM_USE_PATH 在设置 options ， opened_path 应设置为实际被打开的文件/资源的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: If the return parameter is set to TRUE, then the export is returned as a string, otherwise NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 return 参数设置为 TRUE ，则导出将以字符串形式返回，否则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the return_var argument is present along with the output argument, then the return status of the executed command will be written to this variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果 return_var 自变量与 output 变量一起存在，则已执行命令的返回状态将被写入此变量。

trans-unit.source: If the return_var argument is present, the return status of the Unix command will be placed here.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 return_var 参数，则将在此处放置Unix命令的返回状态。

trans-unit.source: If the return_var argument is present, then the return status of the executed command will be written to this variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 return_var 参数，则已执行命令的返回状态将被写入此变量。

trans-unit.source: If the start argument is provided, it points to the position at which the search should begin; otherwise, the search is performed from the start of the string. If end argument provided, the search is performed between start and end buffer positions.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 start 参数，它将指向应该开始搜索的位置；否则，从字符串的开头开始搜索。如果提供了 end 参数，则在开始和结束缓冲区位置之间执行搜索。

trans-unit.source: If the start argument is provided, it represents the position at which the search should begin; otherwise, the search is performed from the start of the string. If end argument provided, the search is performed between start and end buffer positions.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 start 参数，则它代表搜索应开始的位置；否则，从字符串的开头开始搜索。如果提供了 end 参数，则在开始和结束缓冲区位置之间执行搜索。

trans-unit.source: If the start parameter indicates the position of a negative truncation or beyond, false is returned. Other versions get the string from start.
trans-unit.target: 如果 start 参数指示负截断位置或更大的截断位置，则返回false。其他版本从一开始就获取字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is used to pass a stream to this function, then the stream must be seekable. Note that the file pointer position is not changed after this function returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用该 stream 将流传递给此函数，则该流必须是可搜索的。请注意，此函数返回后，文件指针位置不会更改。

trans-unit.source: If the strict parameter is set to TRUE then the base64_decode() function will return FALSE if the input contains character from outside the base64 alphabet. Otherwise invalid characters will be silently discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果 strict 参数设置为 TRUE ,那么如果输入包含来自base64字母外部的字符，则base64_decode（）函数将返回 FALSE 。否则，无效字符将被静默丢弃。

trans-unit.source: If the strong parameter is TRUE, then an E_WARNING level error will be emitted when the fallback rand() implementation is used to fill the remaining random bytes (e.g., when not enough random data was found, initially).
trans-unit.target: 如果 strong 参数为 TRUE ，则当使用后备rand（）实现填充剩余的随机字节时（例如，当最初找不到足够的随机数据时），将发出 E_WARNING 级错误。

trans-unit.source: If the timeout parameter is set, this function returns TRUE on success and FALSE on failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 timeout 参数，则此函数在成功时返回 TRUE ，在失败时返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the weight array is given, it will be filled with the weight information gathered.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 weight 数组，它将被收集的权重信息填充。

trans-unit.source: If the basename of the path starts with a dot, the following characters are interpreted as extension, and the filename is empty (see third example below).
trans-unit.target: 如果基本名称的的 path 以一个点开始，下面的字符被解释为延伸，并且文件名是空的（见下面的第三个例子）。

trans-unit.source: If the Memcached::OPT_COMPRESSION is enabled, the operation will fail and a warning will be issued, because appending compressed data to a value that is potentially already compressed is not possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 Memcached::OPT_COMPRESSION ，则该操作将失败并发出警告，因为不可能将压缩数据附加到可能已经压缩的值上。

trans-unit.source: If the Memcached::OPT_COMPRESSION is enabled, the operation will fail and a warning will be issued, because prepending compressed data to a value that is potentially already compressed is not possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 Memcached::OPT_COMPRESSION ，则操作将失败并发出警告，因为不可能将压缩数据添加到可能已经压缩的值。

trans-unit.source: If the BLOB was being read, this function returns TRUE on success, if the BLOB was being written to, this function returns a string containing the BLOB id that has been assigned to it by the database. On failure, this function returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在读取BLOB，则此函数成功时返回 TRUE ，如果正在写入BLOB，则此函数返回包含数据库已为其分配的BLOB ID的字符串。失败时，此函数返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the DateInterval object was created by DateTime::diff(), then this is the total number of days between the start and end dates. Otherwise, days will be FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果DateInterval对象是由DateTime :: diff（）创建的，则这是开始日期和结束日期之间的总天数。否则， days 将为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the PDO driver does not support this capability, PDO::lastInsertId() triggers an IM001 SQLSTATE.
trans-unit.target: 如果PDO驱动程序不支持此功能，则PDO :: lastInsertId（）会触发IM001 SQLSTATE。

trans-unit.source: If the PDOStatement object was returned from PDO::prepare(), an accurate column count will not be available until you invoke PDOStatement::execute().
trans-unit.target: 如果PDOStatement对象是从PDO :: prepare（）返回的，则在您调用PDOStatement :: execute（）之前，无法获得准确的列数。

trans-unit.source: If the PDOStatement object was returned from PDO::query(), the column count is immediately available.
trans-unit.target: 如果从PDO :: query（）返回了PDOStatement对象，则列数立即可用。

trans-unit.source: If the PHP directive register_globals is set to on then cookie values will also be made into variables. In our examples below, $TestCookie will exist. It's recommended to use $_COOKIE.
trans-unit.target: 如果将PHP指令register_globals设置为on，则cookie值也将变为变量。在下面的示例中， $TestCookie 将存在。建议使用 $_COOKIE 。

trans-unit.source: If the SQLSTATE error code is not set or there is no driver-specific error, the elements following element 0 will be set to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置SQLSTATE错误代码或没有特定于驱动程序的错误，则元素0之后的元素将设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the arguments are passed by reference, any changes to the arguments will be reflected in the values returned by this function. As of PHP 7 the current values will also be returned if the arguments are passed by value.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是通过引用传递的,任何对参数的修改都会反映在这个函数返回的值中。在PHP 7中,如果参数是通过值传递的,那么当前值也会被返回。

trans-unit.source: If the array is changed from the callback function (e.g. element added, deleted or unset) the behavior of this function is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组从回调函数中改变了(例如添加、删除或取消设置元素),这个函数的行为是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: If the array is empty and initial is not passed, array_reduce() returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组为空且未传递 initial ，则array_reduce（）返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the base name ends in suffix, this will be cut.
trans-unit.target: 如果基本名称以 suffix 结尾，则会被剪切。

trans-unit.source: If the call is successful the opened data is returned in this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用成功,打开的数据将在此参数中返回。

trans-unit.source: If the call was interrupted by a signal, sleep() returns a non-zero value. On Windows, this value will always be 192 (the value of the WAIT_IO_COMPLETION constant within the Windows API). On other platforms, the return value will be the number of seconds left to sleep.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用被信号中断，sleep（）将返回一个非零值。在Windows上，此值将始终为192（Windows API中 WAIT_IO_COMPLETION 常数的值）。在其他平台上，返回值将是睡眠的秒数。

trans-unit.source: If the call was successful the signature is returned in signature.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫成功，则以signature返回 signature 。

trans-unit.source: If the called function expects a parameter to be passed by reference, an E_WARNING is now issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果被调用函数希望参数通过引用传递，则现在发出 E_WARNING 。

trans-unit.source: If the caller is a super user, this will also set the effective group id.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫者是超级用户,这也将设置有效的组ID。

trans-unit.source: If the child could be removed the function returns the old child.
trans-unit.target: 如果子代可以被删除,函数返回旧的子代。

trans-unit.source: If the class does not exist, the function returns FALSE and adds an error to the error collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果该类不存在，则该函数返回 FALSE 并将错误添加到错误集合。

trans-unit.source: If the class name is used e.g. in call_user_func() then it can contain some dangerous characters such as ../. It is recommended to not use the user-input in such functions or at least verify the input in __autoload().
trans-unit.target: 如果在例如call_user_func（）中使用了类名，则它可能包含一些危险字符，例如../。建议不要在此类函数中使用用户输入，或至少在__autoload（）中验证输入。

trans-unit.source: If the command to be executed could not be found, a valid resource is returned. This may seem odd, but makes sense; it allows you to access any error message returned by the shell:
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到要执行的命令,则返回一个有效的资源。这可能看起来很奇怪,但很有意义;它允许你访问shell返回的任何错误信息。

trans-unit.source: If the condition is not a sequence of digits or (R), it must be an assertion. This may be a positive or negative lookahead or lookbehind assertion. Consider this pattern, again containing non-significant white space, and with the two alternatives on the second line:
trans-unit.target: 如果条件不是数字序列或(R),它必须是一个断言。这可能是一个正的或负的lookahead或lookbehind断言。考虑一下这个模式,同样包含非显著的空白,并且在第二行有两个选项。

trans-unit.source: If the condition is satisfied, the yes-pattern is used; otherwise the no-pattern (if present) is used. If there are more than two alternatives in the subpattern, a compile-time error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果满足条件,则使用 "是 "模式;否则使用 "否 "模式(如果存在)。如果子模式中有两个以上的选择,就会出现编译时错误。

trans-unit.source: If the condition is the string (R), it is satisfied if a recursive call to the pattern or subpattern has been made. At "top level", the condition is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果条件是字符串（R），则可以对模式或子模式进行递归调用。在“顶层”，条件为假。

trans-unit.source: If the database server successfully prepares the statement, PDO::prepare() returns a PDOStatement object. If the database server cannot successfully prepare the statement, PDO::prepare() returns FALSE or emits PDOException (depending on error handling).
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库服务器成功准备了该语句，则PDO :: prepare（）返回PDOStatement对象。如果数据库服务器无法成功准备该语句，则PDO :: prepare（）返回 FALSE 或发出PDOException（取决于错误处理）。

trans-unit.source: If the database was set to autocommit mode, this function will restore autocommit mode after it has rolled back the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库被设置为自动提交模式,该函数将在回滚事务后恢复自动提交模式。

trans-unit.source: If the default event loop is not created, EvLoop::defaultLoop() creates it with the specified parameters. Otherwise, it just returns the object representing previously created instance ignoring all the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果未创建默认事件循环，则EvLoop :: defaultLoop（）使用指定的参数创建它。否则，它将仅返回表示先前创建的实例的对象，而忽略所有参数。

trans-unit.source: If the delay was interrupted by a signal, an associative array will be returned with the components:
trans-unit.target: 如果延时被信号打断,将返回一个关联数组,其中包含元件。

trans-unit.source: If the delimiter needs to be matched inside the pattern it must be escaped using a backslash. If the delimiter appears often inside the pattern, it is a good idea to choose another delimiter in order to increase readability.
trans-unit.target: 如果定界符需要在模式中匹配,则必须使用反斜杠进行转义。如果定界符经常出现在图案中,最好选择另一种定界符,以增加可读性。

trans-unit.source: If the deprecated register_globals directive is set to on then the variables within will also be made available in the global scope of the script. For example, $_POST['foo'] would also exist as $foo.
trans-unit.target: 如果不赞成使用的register_globals指令设置为on，则其中的变量也将在脚本的全局范围内可用。例如， $_POST['foo'] 也将作为 $foo 存在。

trans-unit.source: If the destination file already exists, it will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标文件已经存在,它将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If the digit is less than 10, then '0' + digit is returned. Otherwise, the value 'a' + digit - 10 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果数字小于10，则返回“ 0” +数字。否则，返回值“ a” +数字-10。

trans-unit.source: If the directive magic_quotes_sybase is ON it will completely override magic_quotes_gpc. So even when get_magic_quotes_gpc() returns TRUE neither double quotes, backslashes or NUL's will be escaped. Only single quotes will be escaped. In this case they'll look like: ''
trans-unit.target: 如果指令magic_quotes_sybase为ON，它将完全覆盖magic_quotes_gpc。因此，即使get_magic_quotes_gpc（）返回 TRUE ,也不会转义双引号，反斜杠或NUL。仅单引号将被转义。在这种情况下，它们看起来像：''

trans-unit.source: If the element hasn't been encoded, and in other words is in plain US-ASCII, the charset property of that element is set to default.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素尚未编码，换句话说是纯US-ASCII格式，则该元素的charset属性设置为default。

trans-unit.source: If the field uses a PostgreSQL domain (rather than a basic type), it is the OID of the domain's underlying type that is returned, rather than the OID of the domain itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段使用PostgreSQL域(而不是基本类型),返回的是域的底层类型的OID,而不是域本身的OID。

trans-unit.source: If the field uses a PostgreSQL domain (rather than a basic type), it is the name of the domain's underlying type that is returned, rather than the name of the domain itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字段使用PostgreSQL域(而不是基本类型),那么返回的是域的底层类型的名称,而不是域本身的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, it will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不存在,就会被创建。

trans-unit.source: If the file is opened for reading, this function is emulated but can be extremely slow. If the file is opened for writing, only forward seeks are supported; gzseek() then compresses a sequence of zeroes up to the new starting position.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开文件进行读取，则会模拟此功能，但速度可能非常慢。如果打开文件进行写入，则仅支持向前搜索；然后gzseek（）将零序列压缩到新的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: If the file type is EIO_S_IFCHR or EIO_S_IFBLK then dev specifies the major and minor numbers of the newly created device special file. Otherwise dev ignored. See mknod(2) man page for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件类型为 EIO_S_IFCHR 或 EIO_S_IFBLK ,则dev将指定新创建的设备专用文件的主要和次要编号。否则， dev 忽略。有关详细信息，请参见mknod（2）手册页。

trans-unit.source: If the first and only parameter is an array, max() returns the highest value in that array. If at least two parameters are provided, max() returns the biggest of these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个也是唯一的参数是数组，则max（）返回该数组中的最大值。如果至少提供两个参数，则max（）返回这些值中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: If the first and only parameter is an array, min() returns the lowest value in that array. If at least two parameters are provided, min() returns the smallest of these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个也是唯一的参数是数组，则min（）返回该数组中的最小值。如果提供至少两个参数，则min（）返回这些值中的最小值。

trans-unit.source: If the float is beyond the boundaries of integer (usually +/- 2.15e+9 = 2^31 on 32-bit platforms and +/- 9.22e+18 = 2^63 on 64-bit platforms other than Windows), the result is undefined, since the float doesn't have enough precision to give an exact integer result. No warning, not even a notice will be issued when this happens!
trans-unit.target: 如果浮点数超出整数的范围（在32位平台上通常为+/- 2.15e + 9 = 2 ^ 31，而在Windows以外的64位平台上通常为+/- 9.22e + 18 = 2 ^ 63），由于浮点数的精度不足以提供精确的整数结果，因此结果是不确定的。没有警告，发生这种情况甚至不会发出通知！

trans-unit.source: If the function fails it generates an E_NOTICE.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数失败，它将生成 E_NOTICE 。

trans-unit.source: If the function fails, the optional errorcode will be set to the value of the system errno variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数失败，则将可选 errorcode 设置为系统errno变量的值。

trans-unit.source: If the function has arguments that need to be references, then they must be references in the passed argument list.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数有需要引用的参数,那么它们必须是传递的参数列表中的引用。

trans-unit.source: If the function returns FALSE then the normal error handler continues.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数返回 FALSE ,则正常错误处理程序继续。

trans-unit.source: If the generator is already closed when this method is invoked, the exception will be thrown in the caller's context instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用本方法时生成器已经关闭,则会在调用者的上下文中抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: If the generator is not at a yield expression when this method is called, it will first be let to advance to the first yield expression before sending the value. As such it is not necessary to "prime" PHP generators with a Generator::next() call (like it is done in Python).
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用此方法时生成器未处于yield表达式，则在发送值之前，首先让其前进到第一个yield表达式。因此，不必通过Generator :: next（）调用来“初始化” PHP生成器（就像在Python中那样）。

trans-unit.source: If the given handle is a resource, this function will return a string representing its type. If the type is not identified by this function, the return value will be the string Unknown.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的 handle 是资源，则此函数将返回表示其类型的字符串。如果此函数无法识别类型，则返回值为字符串Unknown。

trans-unit.source: If the given socket is of type AF_INET or AF_INET6, socket_getpeername() will return the peers (remote) IP address in appropriate notation (e.g. 127.0.0.1 or fe80::1) in the address parameter and, if the optional port parameter is present, also the associated port.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的套接字类型为 AF_INET 或 AF_INET6 ，则socket_getpeername（）将在 address 参数中（如果存在可选的 port 参数）以适当的符号（例如127.0.0.1或fe80 :: 1）返回对等（远程）IP地址。，以及关联的端口。

trans-unit.source: If the given socket is of type AF_INET or AF_INET6, socket_getsockname() will return the local IP address in appropriate notation (e.g. 127.0.0.1 or fe80::1) in the address parameter and, if the optional port parameter is present, also the associated port.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的套接字类型为 AF_INET 或 AF_INET6 ，则socket_getsockname（）将在 address 参数中以适当的符号（例如127.0.0.1或fe80 :: 1）返回本地IP地址，如果存在可选的 port 参数，则还会返回关联的端口。

trans-unit.source: If the given socket is of type AF_UNIX, socket_getpeername() will return the Unix filesystem path (e.g. /var/run/daemon.sock) in the address parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的套接字类型为 AF_UNIX ，则socket_getpeername（）将在 address 参数中返回Unix文件系统路径（例如/var/run/daemon.sock）。

trans-unit.source: If the given socket is of type AF_UNIX, socket_getsockname() will return the Unix filesystem path (e.g. /var/run/daemon.sock) in the address parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的套接字类型为 AF_UNIX ，则socket_getsockname（）将在 address 参数中返回Unix文件系统路径（例如/var/run/daemon.sock）。

trans-unit.source: If the hexadecimal input string is of odd length or invalid hexadecimal string an E_WARNING level error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果十六进制输入字符串的长度为奇数或无效的十六进制字符串，则会引发 E_WARNING 级错误。

trans-unit.source: If the image contains any IFD0 data then COMPUTED contains the entry ByteOrderMotorola which is 0 for little-endian (intel) and 1 for big-endian (motorola) byte order. Also, COMPUTED and UserComment no longer only contain the first copyright entry if the datatype was wrong.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像包含任何IFD0数据，则COMPUTED包含条目ByteOrderMotorola，对于小端（英特尔）为0，对于大端（摩托罗拉）字节顺序为1。同样，如果数据类型错误，则COMPUTED和UserComment不再仅包含第一个版权条目。

trans-unit.source: If the image is a truecolor image, this function returns the RGB value of that pixel as integer. Use bitshifting and masking to access the distinct red, green and blue component values:
trans-unit.target: 如果图像是纯色图像,该函数以整数形式返回该像素的RGB值。使用位移和遮罩来访问不同的红、绿、蓝分量值。

trans-unit.source: If the include occurs inside a function within the calling file, then all of the code contained in the called file will behave as though it had been defined inside that function. So, it will follow the variable scope of that function. An exception to this rule are magic constants which are evaluated by the parser before the include occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果include发生在调用文件内的函数内，则被调用文件中包含的所有代码将表现为已在该函数内定义。因此，它将遵循该函数的可变范围。该规则的一个例外是魔术常数，该魔术常数在包含发生之前由解析器评估。

trans-unit.source: If the input string contains an invalid code unit sequence within the given encoding an empty string will be returned, unless either the ENT_IGNORE or ENT_SUBSTITUTE flags are set.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入 string 在给定的 encoding 内包含无效的代码单元序列，则将返回空字符串，除非设置了 ENT_IGNORE 或 ENT_SUBSTITUTE 标志。

trans-unit.source: If the input arrays have the same string keys, then the later value for that key will overwrite the previous one. If, however, the arrays contain numeric keys, the later value will not overwrite the original value, but will be appended.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入数组具有相同的字符串键，则该键的后一个值将覆盖前一个。但是，如果数组包含数字键，则后面的值将不会覆盖原始值，而是将其附加。

trans-unit.source: If the input arrays have the same string keys, then the values for these keys are merged together into an array, and this is done recursively, so that if one of the values is an array itself, the function will merge it with a corresponding entry in another array too. If, however, the arrays have the same numeric key, the later value will not overwrite the original value, but will be appended.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的数组有相同的字符串键,那么这些键的值就会被合并到一个数组中,这是以递归的方式进行的,所以如果其中一个值本身就是一个数组,那么该函数也会将其与另一个数组中的相应条目合并。但是,如果这几个数组有相同的数字键,那么后面的值不会覆盖原来的值,而是会被追加。

trans-unit.source: If the input string passed to this function and the final document share the same character set, this function is sufficient to prepare input for inclusion in most contexts of an HTML document. If, however, the input can represent characters that are not coded in the final document character set and you wish to retain those characters (as numeric or named entities), both this function and htmlentities() (which only encodes substrings that have named entity equivalents) may be insufficient. You may have to use mb_encode_numericentity() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给此函数的输入字符串和最终文档共享相同的字符集，则此函数足以准备将输入包含在HTML文档的大多数上下文中。但是，如果输入可以表示未在最终文档字符集中编码的字符，而您希望保留这些字符（作为数字或命名实体），则此函数和htmlentities（）（仅对具有命名实体的子字符串进行编码）等值）可能不足。您可能不得不使用mb_encode_numericentity（）。

trans-unit.source: If the interlace bit is set and the image is used as a
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了隔行扫描位,并且将图像用作

trans-unit.source: If the internal pointer for the array points past the end of the array contents, each() returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组的内部指针指向数组内容的末尾，则each（）返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the last SQL statement executed by the associated PDOStatement was a SELECT statement, some databases may return the number of rows returned by that statement. However, this behaviour is not guaranteed for all databases and should not be relied on for portable applications.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的PDOStatement执行的最后一条SQL语句是SELECT语句，则某些数据库可能返回该语句返回的行数。但是，并非对于所有数据库都可以保证此行为，并且便携式应用程序不应该依赖此行为。

trans-unit.source: If the last two examples above seem odd, see String conversion to numbers.
trans-unit.target: 如果以上最后两个示例看起来很奇怪，请参阅将字符串转换为数字。

trans-unit.source: If the message is longer than maxsize, setting this flag will truncate the message to maxsize and will not signal an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息的长度大于 maxsize ，则设置此标志会将消息截断为 maxsize ,并且不会表示错误。

trans-unit.source: If the message is too large to fit in the queue, your script will wait until another process reads messages from the queue and frees enough space for your message to be sent. This is called blocking; you can prevent blocking by setting the optional blocking parameter to FALSE, in which case msg_send() will immediately return FALSE if the message is too big for the queue, and set the optional errorcode to MSG_EAGAIN, indicating that you should try to send your message again a little later on.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息太大而无法放入队列中，则脚本将等待，直到另一个进程从队列中读取消息并释放足够的空间以发送消息。这称为阻塞；您可以通过将可选的 blocking 参数设置为 FALSE 来防止阻塞，在这种情况下，如果消息对于队列而言太大，则msg_send（）将立即返回 FALSE ，并将可选的 errorcode MSG_EAGAIN 设置为MSG_EAGAIN，指示您应该尝试发送消息再过一会儿。

trans-unit.source: If the name already exists, it must be able to be opened by the current user that the process is running as or an exception will be thrown with a meaningless error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称已经存在,那么它必须能够被当前用户打开,而当前用户是以该进程的名义运行的,否则将抛出一个毫无意义的错误信息的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the name component ends in suffix this will also be cut off.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称部分以 suffix 结尾，则该名称部分也将被切除。

trans-unit.source: If the number is greater than maximal int value, mysqli_insert_id() will return a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果该数字大于最大int值，则mysqli_insert_id（）将返回一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the number of affected rows is greater than maximal PHP int value, the number of affected rows will be returned as a string value.
trans-unit.target: 如果受影响的行数大于最大的PHP int值,受影响的行数将作为一个字符串值返回。

trans-unit.source: If the number of affected rows is greater than the maximum integer value( PHP_INT_MAX ), the number of affected rows will be returned as a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果受影响的行数大于最大整数值（ PHP_INT_MAX ），则受影响的行数将作为字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: If the number of rows is greater than PHP_INT_MAX, the number will be returned as a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果行数大于 PHP_INT_MAX ，则该数字将作为字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: If the number of the year is specified in a two digit format, the values between 00-69 are mapped to 2000-2069 and 70-99 to 1970-1999. See the notes below for possible differences on 32bit systems (possible dates might end on 2038-01-19 03:14:07).
trans-unit.target: 如果年号是以两位数格式指定的,那么00-69之间的数值被映射到2000-2069,70-99被映射到1970-1999。32位系统上可能存在的差异见下面的说明(可能的日期可能在2038-01-19 03:14:07结束)。

trans-unit.source: If the object does not have a parent or the class given does not exist FALSE will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象没有父对象或给定的类不存在，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the open fails, bzopen() returns FALSE, otherwise it returns a pointer to the newly opened file.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开失败，则bzopen（）返回 FALSE ，否则返回指向新打开文件的指针。

trans-unit.source: If the open fails, an error of level E_WARNING is generated. You may use @ to suppress this warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开失败，将生成级别为 E_WARNING 的错误。您可以使用@禁止显示此警告。

trans-unit.source: If the open fails, the function returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开失败，则函数返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the operand for the ~ operator is a string, the operation will be performed on the ASCII values of the characters that make up the string and the result will be a string, otherwise the operand and the result will be treated as integers.
trans-unit.target: 如果〜运算符的操作数是字符串，则将对构成字符串的字符的ASCII值执行操作，结果将是字符串，否则操作数和结果将被视为整数。

trans-unit.source: If the optional base parameter is specified, log() returns logbasearg, otherwise log() returns the natural logarithm of arg.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了可选的 base 参数，则log（）返回log base arg ，否则log（）返回 arg 的自然对数。

trans-unit.source: If the optional delimiter is specified, it will also be escaped. This is useful for escaping the delimiter that is required by the PCRE functions. The / is the most commonly used delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了可选的 delimiter ，则也将对其进行转义。这对于转义PCRE功能所需的分隔符很有用。的/是最常用的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: If the optional errno and errstr arguments are present they will be set to indicate the actual system level error that occurred in the system-level socket(), bind(), and listen() calls. If the value returned in errno is 0 and the function returned FALSE, it is an indication that the error occurred before the bind() call. This is most likely due to a problem initializing the socket. Note that the errno and errstr arguments will always be passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在可选的 errno 和 errstr 参数，则将它们设置为指示在系统级socket（），bind（）和listen（）调用中发生的实际系统级错误。如果在返回的值 errno 为0和该函数返回 FALSE ，它是在之前发生错误的指示绑定（）调用。这很可能是由于初始化套接字时出现问题。注意， errno 和 errstr 参数将始终通过引用传递。

trans-unit.source: If the optional extension parameter is specified, phpversion() returns the version of that extension, or FALSE if there is no version information associated or the extension isn't enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了可选的 extension 参数，则phpversion（）返回该扩展名的版本；如果没有关联的版本信息或未启用该扩展名，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the optional file and line parameters are set, headers_sent() will put the PHP source file name and line number where output started in the file and line variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了可选的 file 和 line 参数，则headers_sent（）会将PHP源文件名和行号放在 file 和 line 变量中开始输出的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the optional format parameter is set to non-zero, get_headers() parses the response and sets the array's keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选的 format 参数设置为非零，则get_headers（）解析响应并设置数组的键。

trans-unit.source: If the optional initial is available, it will be used at the beginning of the process, or as a final result in case the array is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选的 initial 是可用的，它将在过程开始时使用，或在数组为空的情况下用作最终结果。

trans-unit.source: If the optional mode parameter is set to COUNT_RECURSIVE (or 1), count() will recursively count the array. This is particularly useful for counting all the elements of a multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选 mode 参数设置为 COUNT_RECURSIVE （或1），则count（）将递归地对数组进行计数。这对于计算多维数组的所有元素特别有用。

trans-unit.source: If the optional raw_output is set to TRUE, then the md5 digest is instead returned in raw binary format with a length of 16.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选的 raw_output 设置为 TRUE ，则将以原始二进制格式返回md5摘要，其长度为16。

trans-unit.source: If the optional raw_output is set to TRUE, then the sha1 digest is instead returned in raw binary format with a length of 20, otherwise the returned value is a 40-character hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选的 raw_output 设置为 TRUE ，那么将以原始二进制格式返回sha1摘要，其长度为20，否则返回的值为40个字符的十六进制数字。

trans-unit.source: If the optional search_value is specified, then only the keys for that value are returned. Otherwise, all the keys from the array are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了可选的 search_value ，则仅返回该值的键。否则，将返回 array 中的所有键。

trans-unit.source: If the optional split_length parameter is specified, the returned array will be broken down into chunks with each being split_length in length, otherwise each chunk will be one character in length.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了可选的 split_length 参数，则返回的数组将分解为块，每个块的长度为 split_length ，否则每个块的长度为一个字符。

trans-unit.source: If the optional userdata parameter is supplied, it will be passed as the third parameter to the callback.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了可选的 userdata 参数，它将作为第三个参数传递给 callback 。

trans-unit.source: If the optional parameter chunk_size is passed, the buffer will be flushed after any output call which causes the buffer's length to equal or exceed chunk_size. The default value 0 means that the output function will only be called when the output buffer is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了可选参数 chunk_size ，则在导致缓冲区长度等于或超过 chunk_size 的任何输出调用之后，都会刷新缓冲区。默认值0表示仅在关闭输出缓冲区时才调用输出函数。

trans-unit.source: If the optional parameter regs was not passed or the length of the matched string is 0, this function returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果未传递可选参数 regs 或匹配的字符串的长度为0，则此函数返回1。

trans-unit.source: If the outer script which is instantiating the Runkit_Sandbox class is configured with safe_mode = off, then safe_mode may be turned on for the sandbox environment. This setting can not be used to disable safe_mode when it's already enabled in the outer script.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例化Runkit_Sandbox类的外部脚本配置为safe_mode = off，则可以在沙箱环境中打开safe_mode。如果外部脚本中已启用该设置，则不能使用它禁用safe_mode。

trans-unit.source: If the outer script which is instantiating the Runkit_Sandbox class is configured with safe_mode_gid = on, then safe_mode_gid may be turned off for the sandbox environment. This setting can not be used to enable safe_mode_gid when it's already disabled in the outer script.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例化Runkit_Sandbox类的外部脚本配置了safe_mode_gid = on，则可以在沙箱环境中关闭safe_mode_gid。如果外部脚本中已经禁用了safe_mode_gid，则不能使用此设置。

trans-unit.source: If the outer script which is instantiating the Runkit_Sandbox class is configured with a safe_mode_include_dir, then a new safe_mode_include_dir may be set for sandbox environments below the currently defined value. safe_mode_include_dir may also be cleared to indicate that the bypass feature is disabled. If safe_mode_include_dir was blank in the outer script, but safe_mode was not enabled, then any arbitrary safe_mode_include_dir may be set while turning safe_mode on.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例化Runkit_Sandbox类的外部脚本配置了safe_mode_include_dir，则可以为沙箱环境设置一个低于当前定义值的新safe_mode_include_dir。还可以清除safe_mode_include_dir以指示已禁用旁路功能。如果外部脚本中的safe_mode_include_dir为空白，但未启用safe_mode，则可以在打开safe_mode时设置任意的safe_mode_include_dir。

trans-unit.source: If the parse_mode parameter is set to SolrResponse::PARSE_SOLR_OBJ Solr documents will be parses as SolrObject instances.
trans-unit.target: 如果parse_mode参数被设置为SolrResponse::PARSE_SOLR_OBJ,Solr文档将被解析为SolrObject实例。

trans-unit.source: If the passed callback is not callable a E_WARNING level error will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递的回调不可调用，则将生成 E_WARNING 级错误。

trans-unit.source: If the passed file pointer is not valid you may get an infinite loop, because feof() fails to return TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递的文件指针无效，则可能会发生无限循环，因为feof（）无法返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: If the pattern contains duplicate named subpatterns, only the rightmost subpattern is stored in <var><var>$matches[NAME]</var></var>.
trans-unit.target: 如果模式包含重复的命名子模式，则仅最右边的子模式存储在 <var><var>$matches[NAME]</var></var> 。

trans-unit.source: If the pattern contains named subpatterns, <var><var>$matches</var></var> additionally contains entries for keys with the subpattern name.
trans-unit.target: 如果模式包含命名的子模式，则 <var><var>$matches</var></var> 还将包含带有子模式名称的键的条目。

trans-unit.source: If the pattern given by the first parameter of Yaf_Route_Regex::_construct() matche the request uri, return TRUE, otherwise return FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果Yaf_Route_Regex :: _ construct（）的第一个参数给出的模式与请求uri相匹配，则返回 TRUE ，否则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If the property is non-static an object must be provided to change the property on. If the property is static this parameter is left out and only value needs to be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性是非静态的，则必须提供一个对象以更改该属性。如果属性是静态的，则忽略此参数，仅需要提供 value 。

trans-unit.source: If the property is non-static an object must be provided to fetch the property from. If you want to fetch the default property without providing an object use ReflectionClass::getDefaultProperties() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性是非静态的，则必须提供一个对象以从中获取该属性。如果要获取默认属性而不提供对象，请使用ReflectionClass :: getDefaultProperties（）代替。

trans-unit.source: If the query is valid but no results are returned, then NULL will be returned if entire_row is FALSE, otherwise an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询有效，但未返回任何结果，则如果 entire_row 为 FALSE ，则将返回 NULL ，否则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: If the query raises an error, returns FALSE. If it is successful and there is a (possibly empty) result set (such as with a SELECT query), returns a result identifier. If the query was successful and there were no results, returns TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询引发错误，则返回 FALSE 。如果成功并且存在（可能为空）结果集（例如使用SELECT查询），则返回结果标识符。如果查询成功并且没有结果，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: If the return is either IntlCalendar::DOW_TYPE_WEEKEND_OFFSET or IntlCalendar::DOW_TYPE_WEEKEND_CEASE, then IntlCalendar::getWeekendTransition() can be called to obtain the time of the transition.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回的是 IntlCalendar::DOW_TYPE_WEEKEND_OFFSET 或 IntlCalendar::DOW_TYPE_WEEKEND_CEASE ，则可以调用IntlCalendar :: getWeekendTransition（）以获取转换时间。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is greater the length of data, E_WARNING will be emitted and the return value will truncated to its length.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值大于 data 长度，则将发出 E_WARNING 并将返回值截断为其长度。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is longer then count an E_WARNING error will be emitted, and excess data will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值是不再那么 count 一个 E_WARNING 错误将被发出，而多余的数据将会丢失。

trans-unit.source: If the second parameter result is present, variables are stored in this variable as array elements instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在第二个参数 result ，则将变量作为数组元素存储在此变量中。

trans-unit.source: If the second parameter of Yaf_Route_Map::__construct() is specificed, then only the part before delimeter of URI will used to routing, the part after it is used to routing request parameters (see the example section of Yaf_Route_Map::__construct()).
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了Yaf_Route_Map :: __ construct（）的第二个参数，则仅URI分隔符之前的部分将用于路由，其后的部分用于路由请求参数（请参见Yaf_Route_Map :: __ construct（）的示例部分） 。

trans-unit.source: If the self test succeeds it returns FALSE. In case of an error, it returns TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 如果自检成功，则返回 FALSE 。如果发生错误，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the data exceeds the size of the shared memory, the number of bytes written returned will be less than the length of the input.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据的大小超过共享内存的大小,则返回的写入字节数将小于输入的长度。

trans-unit.source: If the socket is non-blocking then this function returns FALSE with an error Operation now in progress.
trans-unit.target: 如果套接字是非阻塞的，则此函数返回 FALSE ,并显示错误Operation Now in正在进行。

trans-unit.source: If the socket is of the AF_INET family, the address is an IP in dotted-quad notation (e.g. 127.0.0.1).
trans-unit.target: 如果套接字是 AF_INET 系列的套接字，则该 address 是点分四进制表示形式的IP（例如127.0.0.1）。

trans-unit.source: If the socket is of the AF_UNIX family, the address is the path of a Unix-domain socket (e.g. /tmp/my.sock).
trans-unit.target: 如果套接字是 AF_UNIX 家族的，则该 address 是Unix域套接字的路径（例如 /tmp/my.sock ）。

trans-unit.source: If the socket is of the type AF_UNIX type, name is the path to the file. Else, for unconnected sockets, name is the IP address of, the remote host, or NULL if the socket is connection-oriented.
trans-unit.target: 如果套接字的类型为 AF_UNIX 类型，则 name 是文件的路径。否则，对于未连接的套接字， name 是远程主机的IP地址，如果套接字是面向连接的，则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If the source and destination coordinates and width and heights differ, appropriate stretching or shrinking of the image fragment will be performed. The coordinates refer to the upper left corner. This function can be used to copy regions within the same image (if dst_image is the same as src_image) but if the regions overlap the results will be unpredictable.
trans-unit.target: 如果源坐标和目标坐标以及宽度和高度不同，将对图像片段进行适当的拉伸或收缩。坐标指的是左上角。此功能可用于复制同一图像中的区域（如果 dst_image 与 src_image 相同），但是如果区域重叠，则结果将不可预测。

trans-unit.source: If the specified timestamp is in the past, this function will generate a E_WARNING.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 timestamp 是过去的时间戳，则此函数将生成 E_WARNING 。

trans-unit.source: If the specified key already exists, should it be overwritten?
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的密钥已经存在,是否应该将其覆盖?

trans-unit.source: If the specified number of seconds is negative, this function will generate a E_WARNING.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 seconds 为负，则此函数将生成 E_WARNING 。

trans-unit.source: If the statement is UPDATE, DELETE, or INSERT, the total number of affected rows can be determined by using the mysqli_stmt_affected_rows() function. Likewise, if the query yields a result set the mysqli_stmt_fetch() function is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果该语句是UPDATE，DELETE或INSERT，则可以使用mysqli_stmt_affected_rows（）函数确定受影响的行总数。同样，如果查询产生结果集，则使用mysqli_stmt_fetch（）函数。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is in the process of closing (and therefore this is the last pass through the filterchain), the closing parameter will be set to TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 如果流正在关闭（因此这是通过过滤链的最后一次通过），则 closing 参数将设置为 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: If the string is in a single-byte encoding, such as ASCII, ISO-8859, or Windows 1252, this is equivalent to returning the position of a character in the character set's mapping table. However, note that this function is not aware of any string encoding, and in particular will never identify a Unicode code point in a multi-byte encoding such as UTF-8 or UTF-16.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串是单字节编码,如ASCII、ISO-8859或Windows 1252,这相当于返回字符集映射表中一个字符的位置。但是,请注意,这个函数不知道任何字符串编码,特别是不会识别多字节编码中的Unicode码点,如UTF-8或UTF-16。

trans-unit.source: If the syntax for a recursive subpattern reference (either by number or by name) is used outside the parentheses to which it refers, it operates like a subroutine in a programming language. An earlier example pointed out that the pattern (sens|respons)e and \1ibility matches "sense and sensibility" and "response and responsibility", but not "sense and responsibility". If instead the pattern (sens|respons)e and (?1)ibility is used, it does match "sense and responsibility" as well as the other two strings. Such references must, however, follow the subpattern to which they refer.
trans-unit.target: 如果递归子模式引用的语法（按数字或按名称）在其所引用的括号之外使用，则其作用类似于编程语言中的子例程。一个较早的示例指出，模式（响应）e和\ 1匹配“感官和敏感度”和“响应和责任”，但不匹配“感觉和责任”。相反，如果使用模式（敏感度）和（？1）可及性，则它确实与“意义和责任感”以及其他两个字符串匹配。但是，此类引用必须遵循它们所引用的子模式。

trans-unit.source: If the third optional operator argument is specified, test for a particular relationship. The possible operators are: <, lt, <=, le, >, gt, >=, ge, ==, =, eq, !=, <>, ne respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了第三个可选的 operator 参数，则测试特定的关系。可能的运算符分别是：<，lt，<=，le，>，gt，> =，ge，==，=，eq，！=，<>，ne。

trans-unit.source: If the third parameter strict is set to TRUE then the array_search() function will search for identical elements in the haystack. This means it will also perform a strict type comparison of the needle in the haystack, and objects must be the same instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果将第三个参数 strict 设置为 TRUE ,则array_search（）函数将在 haystack 中搜索相同的元素。这意味着，它也将执行严格的类型比较的的 needle 在 haystack ，和对象必须是相同的实例。

trans-unit.source: If the third parameter strict is set to TRUE then the in_array() function will also check the types of the needle in the haystack.
trans-unit.target: 如果第三个参数 strict 设置为 TRUE 则in_array（）函数还会检查类型中的 needle 在 haystack 。

trans-unit.source: If the value is negative, reading will stop the specified number of bytes from the end of the shared memory segment.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为负值,读取将停止从共享内存段末端开始的指定字节数。

trans-unit.source: If the value is negative, the starting position will begin at the specified number of bytes from the end of the shared memory segment.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为负数,则起始位置将从共享内存段末端的指定字节数开始。

trans-unit.target: 如果 pad_length 的值为负，小于或等于输入字符串的长度，则不进行填充，并且将返回 input 。

trans-unit.target: 如果radix的值不是有效的基数，或者digit的值不是指定的基数中的有效数字，则返回空字符（U + 0000）。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the first subexpression is TRUE (non-zero), then the second subexpression is evaluated, and that is the result of the conditional expression. Otherwise, the third subexpression is evaluated, and that is the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个子表达式的值为 TRUE （非零），则对第二个子表达式求值，这是条件表达式的结果。否则，将评估第三个子表达式，即该值。

trans-unit.source: If the value returned in errno is 0 and the function returned FALSE, it is an indication that the error occurred before the connect() call. This is most likely due to a problem initializing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 如果在返回的值 errno 为0和该函数返回 FALSE ，它是在之前发生错误的指示连接（）调用。这很可能是由于初始化套接字时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being unserialized is an object, after successfully reconstructing the object PHP will automatically attempt to call the __wakeup() member function (if it exists).
trans-unit.target: 如果未序列化的变量是一个对象，则在成功重构该对象后，PHP将自动尝试调用__wakeup（）成员函数（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: If the watcher is pending, this method clears its pending status and returns its revents bitset(as if its callback was invoked). If the watcher isn't pending it does nothing and returns 0 .
trans-unit.target: 如果观察者处于 pending 状态，则此方法清除其挂起状态并返回其 revents （就像调用其回调一样）。如果观察者不在等待状态，则不执行任何操作并返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: If there are functions defined in the included file, they can be used in the main file independent if they are before return or after. If the file is included twice, PHP 5 issues fatal error because functions were already declared, while PHP 4 doesn't complain about functions defined after return. It is recommended to use include_once instead of checking if the file was already included and conditionally return inside the included file.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含文件中定义了函数，则它们可以在返回之前或之后独立用于主文件。如果文件被两次包含，PHP 5会发出致命错误，因为已经声明了函数，而PHP 4并没有抱怨return之后定义的函数。建议使用include_once而不是检查文件是否已包含并有条件地返回到包含的文件中。

trans-unit.source: If there are less than count bytes available, return as many as are available. If no more data is available, return either FALSE or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果可用字节 count 少于计数，则返回尽可能多的字节。如果没有更多数据可用，则返回 FALSE 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If there are more substrings expected in the format than there are available within str, -1 will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果期望的子字符串 format 多于 str 内可用的子字符串，则将返回-1。

trans-unit.source: If there are n occurrences of pattern, the returned array will contain n+1 items. For example, if there is no occurrence of pattern, an array with only one element will be returned. Of course, this is also true if string is empty. If an error occurs, split() returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现n个 pattern ，则返回的数组将包含n + 1个项目。例如，如果没有出现 pattern ，则将返回仅包含一个元素的数组。当然，如果 string 为空，也是如此。如果发生错误，split（）返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If there are n occurrences of pattern, the returned array will contain n+1 items. For example, if there is no occurrence of pattern, an array with only one element will be returned. Of course, this is also true if string is empty. If an error occurs, spliti() returns FALSE.
